name: Norn9: Last Era - Limited Edition
description:
Fandisc for Norn9.
Limited Edition Includes:
15" x 25" Cloth Poster
Collectible Artbook
Set of 11 vinyl Hiyoko Stickers
3" Acrylic Keychain w/ chibi artwork
All in a collectible box

name: Ginsha
description: Ginsha is a unique atmospheric pixelart Action Adventure Platformer with special Gravity Shield and Dash Mechanics. It combines a versatile Platformer core with RPG, Souls and Crafting Elements to an Anomaly among Metroidvania games.

name: Ride 5: Special Edition
description: Enjoy RIDE to the fullest with RIDE 5 - Special Edition! In addition to the full game you'll also get the Season Pass that will give you access to bikes, amazing tracks and a credit multiplier as soon as they become available.

name: Ride 5
description: Rev up your engine and get ready to hit the track with RIDE 5. An adrenaline-filled gaming experience that is so authentic it will make you feel like you're truly racing at break-neck speed. Find your favorite bikes and check out new ones in the ultimate motorcycle game! Race on over 35 tracks and collect more than 200 motorcycles from world-renowned manufacturers, each element is designed to feel like you're riding a real bike.

name: Project Chaos
description: Project Chaos Is An High Octane, Manic & Chaotic, Multiplayer First Person Shooter. Set In 2098, A Team Of Rebels, Activists & Terrorists Band Together With One Goal: To Insight Change. Their Method Of Choice? Chaos!

name: NanoWar: Cells vs. Virus
description: Fight against the viruses and cure the entire body! A face-paced real time strategy game of cell conquest. Loads of players have already got the bug... ready to defend your cells?

name: Pellet Dodge
description: A simple indie game about rescuing your friend to prevent the corruption of the Universe.

name: Saints Row: Merry Saintsmas Cosmetic Pack
description: If you simply cannot wait for Santa's massive old sack, then look no further than the Merry Saintsmas Cosmetic Pack and bring some seasonal stylings to the streets of Santo Ileso whenever and wherever you want!

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon
description: By combining FromSoftware’s longstanding expertise in mech games and their signature robust gameplay, Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon will be a new action experience.

name: War and Peace
description: The classic board game War and Peace comes alive on your computer. Be Napoleon – or stand against him – in a series of short scenarios that cover the epic battles of the age from 1796 on, or in a grand campaign that may – or may not – end on the field of Waterloo.

name: Devil's Island
description: Devil's Island is an FPS with elements of survival, maintained in a horror atmosphere with post-apocalyptic themes in a world that has already ended. This is a game whose history combines what has long been forgotten with what may yet come.

name: Firewall Ultra
description: Enlist as an elite contractor and squad up for PVP and PVE multiplayer missions in Firewall Ultra, a tactical first-person shooter in development by First Contact Entertainment for PS VR2.

name: Blasphemous II
description: The Penitent One awakens as Blasphemous 2 joins him once again in an endless struggle against The Miracle. Dive into a perilous new world filled with mysteries and secrets to discover, and tear your way through monstrous foes that stand between you and your quest to end the cycle one and for all.

name: Hadean Tactics
description: Hadean Tactics is a roguelike deckbuilding game fused with autobattler elements to create a unique strategy experience. Use your cards to influence the actions of your units and help your Hero defeat the Six Wings of Hell.

name: Yandere Tensei: I Can't Beat The Programming!
description:
Mei (name changeable) is an overworked office worker at a black company, who suddenly collapses on the office floor just as she's about to head home after a late night. As she laments her fate and thinks about the bright side of dying at work (enjoy the stigma of working an employee to death, company!), her only regret is that she couldn't read her favourite character's ending in an otome game she loved one last time. But after her vision fades to black, she comes to... right in front of said favourite character in the flesh?! It turns out she was reincarnated as the villainess her bias, Albert, is in love with, just as he's confining her to his manor in his obsession ending!

But unfortunately, despite the miraculous circumstances, things aren't all roses for our heroine. Just as she's about to jump headfirst into a lovey-dovey life with her best boy, the villainess Meirina's original personality yanks control of the body away from her to express her disgust, just as she did in the original ending. It turns out that the original Meirina's mind takes priority when it comes to dealing with Albert. But a strange sound as the villainess's heart flutters opens up a method to get our heroine's desired ending: raise Meirina's affection levels for Albert until she accepts his mad love, so that they can fall into the darkness together!

name: Antuel's Lament
description: Sin descripción

name: Tackle Fire With Gun: The Game
description:
"There is no plot. Just kill!
Dash and shoot as Tackle Fire through 7 action packed levels.
Amass various weapons and get power-ups through a card combo system.

Features: powerful bosses, a gun, invinsible dashing , flame gun,
over 9 card combos, big gun, awesome mid-air flip animation, laser gun,
a truck."

name: Champions Arena
description: Champions Arena is a turn-based gacha RPG. Collect unique Champions and engage in real-time turn-based PVP battles!

name: Party Bros.
description: Party Bros. is a rom hack for Super Mario Bros. that features new levels, custom music and custom graphics.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3 Alpha
description: A new level of hack for Super Mario Bros. 3. Like the original, there are up to 8 worlds.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Premium Edition
description:
Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.
Take on a series of epic battles against powerful bosses. Unlock new abilities and power-ups and become the ultimate warrior. Dodge a barrage of laser beams, and explosions and make sure you are the last one standing.

With its vibrant graphics, pulse-pounding soundtrack, and intuitive controls, Mixx Island Remix is a game that's easy to pick up but hard to put down.

name: Clue/Cluedo: Tropical Pack
description: Step into new Crime Scenes. Use your skills of deduction to unravel the mystery and find out who did it, with what weapon, where. It's the original crime-solving classic with new investigation formats exclusive to the video game. Solve every case and become the detective you want to be!

name: Hovercab Station
description: A bit of a spiritual successor to my 2022 wad, Herschel Spaceport. Blast your way through demons from Hell in a rundown city block. The action takes place up top on the streets, in a (hover!) train station, and in the water filtration system below.

name: 1001 Jigsaw Detective 4
description: An intriguing and mysterious adventure in the detective world! Collect cryptic clues, examine intricate crime scenes, examine photos of suspects and immerse yourself in the fascinating atmosphere of a private investigation.

name: Fishing Guy
description: This is a casual design game. In the game, players can catch a variety of fish with the cannon, including small fish, large sharks, and more. With beautiful graphics, realistic sound and innovative gameplay, it's a casual game for all ages.

name: Totoge
description: Totoge is a fast-paced one-button game. You control a chicken that is constantly falling down towards one of the sides of the screen. Your goal is to avoid landing on the randomly appearing spikes. Press a button to jump in the air and you will score additional points for jumping depending on the distance passed. You will turn around when you hit the sides of the screen. The game is over when you hit the spikes.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Kakuro
description: The royal road of pencil puzzles, this puzzle is extremely fun. In "Kakuro", you break down the totaled numbers given as hints to fill in the spaces. Well. We say "break down the numbers", but in Nikoli's Kakuro very little calculations are actually required, with concentration and the power of deduction being the most necessary attributes.

name: Clue/Cluedo
description: Step into new Crime Scenes. Use your skills of deduction to unravel the mystery and find out who did it, with what weapon, where. It's the original crime-solving classic with new investigation formats exclusive to the video game. Solve every case and become the detective you want to be!

name: Mellowollem
description: "Mellowollem" is an adventure game where you explore maps and find objects to progress. The main character meets a girl on a sunny summer day, and the story unfolds guided by her words. However, detailed story elements remain undisclosed, leaving only the setting of a hot, dreamy summer landscape.

name: WarWar Battle Kingdom
description: An exciting game that requires you to plan and analyze the situation. Get ready for exciting battles, incredible opportunities and exciting challenges. Become a great warrior and win this exciting battle of the kingdoms!

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Battle Pass 2023 Summer Part 2
description: Cooling out with splash wave and enjoy the hot weather! It's packed with exciting missions and rewards, including fantastic Hot Summer outfits, 110 Points, and a whole bunch of other in-game goodies!

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Battle Pass 2023 Summer Bundle Part 2
description: Enjoy your last heat vibe of summer with Battle Pass! Start your journey at Lv.15 and enjoy a bonus of 110 Points and other amazing goodies right from the get-go! Incredible rewards await to help you beat the summer heat, so don't miss out!

name: The Legend of Peks
description: The Legend of Peks is a game made using RPG maker MZ in under 100 hours. For the streamer IHasPeks.

name: 2BBee
description: Exciting adventures await you in the world of the most hardworking little creatures! You will have to survive in the world of bees, develop your hive and raise new generations for your life with the dangers that may await you on your way! Survival sandbox, but how long can you survive?

name: Killon
description: Killon is a vertical scrolling shooter that features exhilarating combat and a special cannon waiting to be unleashed. Fly a Star ship across a universe in chaos and restore the future today.

name: Cosmo Rider
description: Conquer the universe and defend humanity in space on your upgradable Rider ship. Fight unknown creatures and entities in this rogue-lite top-down action game. Ride the Cosmos!

name: VRiking
description: VRiking is a Runner game in VR! Accelerate as fast as you can while collecting points along the way! Dodge the approaching obstacles!

name: Burger Restaurant Simulator
description: Join Burger Restaurant Simulator for delicious moments! Enjoy making hamburgers with great graphics and rich content.

name: Exorcism
description: "Exorcism" is a first-person parkour-style puzzle + horror game. Brave the fog-shrouded town, exorcise the spirits, unravel the mysteries, and save the town!

name: Joyville
description: Joyville is a horror-puzzle adventure game set in an abandoned children's camp. Brace yourself for a gripping journey through the shadows, solving puzzles, and trying to survive amidst the hidden horrors that await you.

name: Zoo Leap
description: Jump from one platform to another to get further. Collect coins to buy new characters.

name: Fortress Saga
description:
Get ready to join Fortress Saga and hop on the adventure of Cor and Louis - the seed filled with the power of life and the descendant of an honored hero!
As you gather allies, you’ll customize your fortress to your own taste and explore dungeons in vast worlds. Defeat your enemies and grow stronger even faster! Plus, the chemistry between heroes and eye-catching graphics will keep you engaged and wanting more.
So what are you waiting for? In Fortress Saga, anything is possible, so come and let your imagination run wild!

name: Politon
description: Politon is an easy to learn turn-based strategy game where you challenge the minds of your opponents with your cunning and wits.

name: Hunter Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: The Lemonade
description: As a scrawny goblin, find lemons in a cave to enjoy a glass of freshly squeezed lemonade. Sokoban-style.

name: Gaia Trek
description: In "Gaia Trek", you will play as Gaia, the shattered will of a planet, and command your spaceship to explore new worlds, collect and refine various resources, build a home on the damaged spacecraft, summon a wide range of monsters, and ultimately, devour other shattered wills to repair yourself.

name: Captroon
description: Captroon is an arcade game about facing waves of insectons, with a weapon and a shield that can be activated when available.

name: Wand Out: A 3D Magical Gay Novel
description: A Harry Potter parody with a lot of gay sex and magic. Choose your mentor, have sex him, and live a unique fantasy adventurer on a 3D choice-drive adult visual novel.

name: It's a Wrap!
description: It's a Wrap! is a challenging puzzle game about making movies in 1980s Hollywood. Figure out the perfect timing of props, actors, and special effects as the Director. Then jump into the scene as the movie's star in a traditional 2D platformer.

name: Sprawl
description:
“You chose exile in search of penance, in place of revenge. I seek to give you both - and in return… I will be set free.” - FATHER

Enter the dystopian world of SPRAWL, a hardcore retro FPS set in an endless cyberpunk megalopolis. Advances in cybernetics and artificial intelligence pushed humanity into a new era, but that golden age has crumbled…leaving behind a broken world.

Play as SEVEN, a disgraced special ops super soldier who finds herself embroiled in conflict with government forces trying to kill her while a mysterious voice in her head pushes her to survive. Betrayed by her organization and on a mission to overthrow the Junta, a military regime that rules the sprawl with an iron fist, SEVEN must escape the walled city and discover what secrets lie at the SPIRE.

The streets of the SPRAWL are vast and the armies of the corporate government seem endless. But the dark alleys and dilapidated apartment surfaces are all compatible with the “Icarus” cybernetic implant, allowing SEVEN to perform gravity-defying wall-running maneuvers and slow down time with excess adrenaline drops from dismembered enemies. With a horde of different troop types and carefully designed weapons, she will be pushed to the limit to survive.

The SPRAWL eventually consumes us all…will you fight your way out?

name: Draft of Darkness
description: Draft of Darkness is a survival horror RPG with deck building and roguelike dungeon exploration. Recruit allies, synergize their decks to create powerful card combos, manage your resources, explore procedurally generated maps and determine the outcome of the story.

name: Dust Fleet
description:
A hybrid of 4x and real time strategy. Players are presented with a starmap and can complete story missions at certain locations to unlock more missions. Side missions are also available for extra rewards.

The player can upgrade their fleet with new ships, and can customise the weapons load out of each one. Ships can be built during the turn-based starmap phase, or in realtime during missions.

The game also features a full mission and campaign editor, and mod.io support so players can share and download new campaigns.

name: King of the Hat
description:
Throw your hat, risk your life. Crush your opponents hat before they crush yours in this fast-paced, hat-based fighting game.
King of the Hat is a fast-paced, hat based, multiplayer game. In this cutesy dystopian world everyone is born with a hat that hosts their soul, and can only die if their hat gets crushed. Your hat can be used as a weapon BUT BE CAREFUL because its also your weakness. Jump around, whip your hat at your friends, crush theirs, and become the King of the Hat!

name: Crusader Kings III: Wards & Wardens
description: Many new education events add greater depth to the training of the young people of court. Educating the children of the court is now more interactive for both formal tutoring and the ever important life lessons. Shape not just the abilities, but the personality of your young charges, steering them to more acceptable or desirable traits for the important role they will play in the future.

name: Deltarune 97
description: Deltarune 97 is a Hong Kong 97 spoof game developed by Late Night Tom based on the video game Deltarune. The game is a recreation of the video Deltarune 97 by Xploshi.

name: Mysterious Mayan Madness
description: Mysterious Mayan Madness is a 20 map megawad (2 of which being an intro and a credits map) created as the fifteenth edition of the Pineapple Under the Sea speedmapping series and our first event of 2022. Hailing as a spiritual successor to Clandestine Castle Crashing, each map was made with an 8 hour time limit with the requirements that mappers make a jungle temple with a minimum of 4 traps of various types and 6 secrets within. After escaping the famous PUSS dev hell, these jungle temples are here to perplex and stun you as you inspect every single brick for a soulsphere.

name: Fun Chess: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: DanMachi Battle Chronicle
description:
Experience the world of Danmachi in 3D with fully voiced dialogue! Relive the story of Danmachi in 3D together with your favorite characters brought to life via anime-style 3D graphics! You can also enjoy game-exclusive movies and scenes drawn at totally different angles from the anime!

Monsters await you in the Dungeon where you can make use of a variety of methods of attacking and evading in exhilarating battles with simple controls!
Perform your favorite deadly attacks, including Firebolt and Lil Rafaga, in spectacular fashion. Go adventuring with your favorite characters!

Take on other adventurers in Magic Stone Contests, free-for-all battles where everyone is an enemy! These are battle royales fought between 8 different players.
Gather more Magic Stones than anyone else to become number 1!

name: Too Bouncy?
description: It's a 2D pixel art game where you have to move a ball toward an exit point while collecting as many gems as possible. To move the box you need to push it with a box using your mouse or by touching your screen if you play on mobile. At the end of a level you will get a ranking from 1 to 3 stars. You'll be scored on time too. To unlock the next level you have to get at least a one star rating.

name: Tommy Gun Witches
description: A whodunit with witches point and click adventure

name: MechWarrior Online: Scaleshot Legendary Mech Pack
description: Presenting the Viper "Scaleshot" Legendary Mech with unique hard points, quirks, and a 30% C-Bill boost! Playing the Legendary Mech will unlock rewards from the Mini Battle pass which includes unique in-game customization items, in-game currency, boosters, and consumables.

name: MechWarrior Online: War Emu Legendary Mech Pack
description: Presenting the Stalker "War Emu" Legendary Mech with unique hard points, quirks, and a 30% C-Bill boost! Playing the Legendary Mech will unlock rewards from the Mini Battle pass which includes unique in-game customization items, in-game currency, boosters, and consumables.

name: Competitive Checkers
description: Are you ready to take on the challenge and become a Checkers champion?

name: Minecraft: Disney - Worlds of Adventure
description: Step into the magic of six classic Disney tales with this unique map. Explore the world of Aladdin and the sea of The Little Mermaid. Help Snow White, or take a trip with Alice in Wonderland. You can even meet Simba in the savanna, or dine with Belle and the Beast in their castle!

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of the Witch
description: To pursue the Witness, Eris Morn must turn to the magic of the Hive and accept a deal that Savathûn crafted before her death. To honor our end of the bargain, Guardians must become masters of the arcane and harness the power required to defeat a god.

name: Anno 1800: National Park Pack
description: Allow your residents to take a break from their busy city life by creating stunning parks and lakes with over 20 new ornaments and systems.

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster): Alice
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Alice (Buster)

name: Only in Passing
description:
A bite-sized, slice-of-life, indie visual novel with a lo-fi aesthetic. It's all about those brief encounters we have during our daily lives.

The scenarios are randomized. And the visual novel can only be played once.

name: Food Fighter Clicker Games
description: Food Fighter Clicker is a clicker game to become the best food fighter in the world by eating fast food and improving your skills. Tap Tap and be the fastest clicker in the world!

name: Crea Run!
description: Run, jump, and gather building blocks...Craft vehicles using the collected blocks and recipes!An action game of running, jumping, and crafting.

name: Icarus: Iceholm Outpost
description: High in the mountains, on terraced cliffs or a large flat frozen lake give you a range of altitudes in which to build your perfect winter retreat.

name: Icarus: Holdfast Outpost
description: Choose one of several islands in a large archipelago lake to build your perfect island retreat by (or on) the water.

name: Fort Solis: Terra Edition
description:
Fort Solis is a riveting story-driven thriller on the Red Planet.

The Terra Edition includes:
- Fort Solis the game
- Fort Solis Extras (Artbook & OST)

name: Star Legacy VR
description: Star Legacy VR is an immersive virtual reality shooting game that incorporates intriguing Roguelike elements into gameplay. Players assume the roles of interstellar guardians who venture across diverse planets and traverse through various time zones.

name: Run For Exodus
description: You find yourself in a zombie apocalypse in our RUN FOR EXODUS game specially designed for VR. Alone, wield weapons with real-life moves and explore a post-apocalyptic world in virtual reality. Get rid of these dead with the quests.

name: Ring Stars
description: Ring Stars is a physics-based 3D fighting game with local multiplayer for up to 4 players.

name: My Camp of Memories: Episode 1
description: Visual novel in the genre of romance and adventure. You are eighteen years old, and you have just entered the last stage of education. However, strange fragments of memories, notes and a series of events say that it will not work out to study calmly. The path you take is entirely in your hands.

name: Brave Bow Archer: Princess Rescue Simulator!
description: The princess is in danger! Archer, shoot the rope and save the princess! Demonstrate your accuracy skills and complete the puzzle with real physics!

name: Run or Die
description: Embark on an adventure across multiple worlds in this dynamic 3D platformer! Utilize the BunnyHOP ability to leap through obstacles, face unique challenges, and uncover hidden secrets. Fun and excitement are guaranteed with every jump!

name: Superior: Vengeance
description: Superior: Vengeance is a roguelite co-op shooter where all the superheroes have turned into evil abominations. Every session you’ll start out unpowered and outgunned, as you hunt the evil superheroes, steal their powers to take on even tougher challenges.

name: Dusk of Dragons: Survivors
description: Sin descripción

name: Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure
description: A new chapter unfolds in Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure, the fourth expansion for the award-winning MMORPG Guild Wars 2. Soar through the skies to combat the strange and otherworldly forces emerging through rifts to devastate Tyria. The adventure continues through three major story and content releases to follow. A self-contained story with its own resolution will play out at launch. Later releases will seamlessly pick up where the launch arc concluded and tell the rest of the expansion's story. Additional features and updates across the game are planned for release every quarter.

name: Daisho: Survival of a Samurai
description: Daisho: Survival of a Samurai is an Action RPG set in the Sengoku era of Japanese history. War is raging as Oda Nobunaga is determined to depose the weak shogun on his throne, engulfing the kingdom in flames and it is your fate to craft your legacy.

name: City Gridlock
description: City traffic management game. Place road signs and traffic lights to optimize traffic to achieve the best efficiency. You can block or divert cars to avoid traffic jams. Increase road speed where necessary.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 2 - The Lustrous of the Universe
description: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 2 - The Lustrous of the Universe is the second chapter of Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy.

name: Immortals of Aveum: Deluxe Edition
description: Summon your power, stop the Everwar, save the realms.

name: Mirrored Souls
description: A mind-bending “single-player-coop” puzzle-platformer in a beautifully illustrated soothing, lovely game.

name: Magic Guardian
description: Magic Guardian is a non-classical tower-defense game challenging you to fight against the Evil forces to protect and save the Soaring Crystals. Why is it non-classical? Because it all happens in VR and YOU are the only defender!

name: Stone Age: Digital Edition
description: Forge your way through the early days of recorded history and build the foundation of human civilization. How bright is humanity's future? It depends on You! Lead your Tribe through the Stone Age!

name: Rogue Station
description: A space station builder simulation roguelite. Fight off enemy ships, fleets and rival stations, build and upgrade your station, hire and manage your crew. Survive as long as you can.

name: Movie to Movie
description: A trivia game for movie lovers. Form a chain between two movies, 6-degrees style! Play the daily challenge or make your own.

name: Immortals of Aveum
description: From the creative director of Dead Space and multiple Call of Duty campaigns comes Immortals of Aveum, a single-player first-person magic shooter set in an original fantasy universe engulfed in magic, rife with conflict, and on the verge of oblivion.

name: For the Crown
description: For the crown is a Puzzle/Supply-chain game where the player obeys the crown's orders to build and develop a production chain to create items and charakters. The demands of the crown will increase according to the level, making the game and the tasks more and more complex.

name: Shopping Spree: Extreme!!!
description: Make your way around the shopping center to collect items on your shopping list. But be careful; one slip up and you'll be paying for a broken item! Avoid grumpy shoppers or simply shove them out of the way! Various other obstacles get in your way as you fill your cart and make it to checkout!

name: Box to the Beat VR
description: Box to the Beat is a fast and rhythmic boxing game that is focused around Indie artists of all genres

name: Chicken Journey
description: Play as an adorable chicken in this relaxing platformer. Jump, climb and solve puzzles to find the answer to the ultimate question chicken can ask.

name: Fort Solis
description: Fort Solis is a single player third person thriller set on the far side of Mars. Engineer Jack Leary responds to a routine alarm. Upon arriving at a dormant Fort Solis he becomes unnerved by the lack of any staff at the base. As the night grows longer events begin to unravel and spiral out of control. The mystery of what Fort Solis was created for starts to appear along with its crew. Can Jack escape with what he has discovered and more importantly, his life?

name: Superior
description: Superior is a roguelite co-op shooter where all the superheroes have turned into evil abominations. Every session you’ll start out unpowered and outgunned, as you hunt the evil superheroes, steal their powers to take on even tougher challenges.

name: Guardians of Lodino Forest
description: This is "Guardians Of Lodino Forest" (G.O.L.F. for short); a surreal need to play experience, an amazing hybrid sports action-adventure rhythm game about shooting an Armored series of giant golf ball boss Guardians into submission and then striking them back into their lair for a hole in one!

name: Arcadia Files: Clyde
description:
The year is 1993.

Clyde Evansdale was murdered.

While it seems straightforward as to who did it and how he died (a bit like a game of Clue) there may, however, be more that's been left unsaid. With the spotty memories of a band ghost, a middle aged detective that needs all the help he can get, and your own intuition; put the pieces of Clyde's life and death together.

name: We're Closed Sorry
description:
We're closed Sorry is a metroidvania in which the player controls both a titular hero traversing the interior of a retro supermarket store and the owner of the store. Immerse in an action-adventure combating bugs, finding secrets, and becoming a dreamt hero.

As the owner of the store, the game only begins when you close your shop allowing all creepy things and bugs to lurk in the dark terrorizing the store and your products.

name: Ama Me (In Incisis)
description: After much wait, your old friend from high school finally replies to your letter and agrees to meet you for coffee at the local bar! Reconnect with him and be besties again!! Or don't!!!

name: Escape from the Shadows
description: Escape from the Shadows is the seventh installment in the Hidden Town series of escape games. Embark on a thrilling point-and-click adventure and solve puzzles and riddles trying to escape from the shadow world.

name: UzeMaze RA
description: A mod of UzeMaze with maps from the RetroAchievements community.

name: Memory: Unlocked
description: Memory: Unlocked is a short visual novel made for Velox Fabula 2023, a ranked jam about crafting a complete visual novel in 10 days, based on a community-determined theme.

name: Super Junkoid
description: Trapped in a twisted dream where she is revered as a goddess, Junko must face the horrifying serpent that worships her.

name: Finity
description:
Welcome to Finity: a thoughtful, handcrafted matching game.

A few rules lead to endless strategy, flow, and exciting close calls.

1. Tiles wrap around.

2. Slide rows or columns to match 3.

3. Moves are limited, so think carefully!

Climb the leaderboards as you level up your skills to unlock challenging special tiles, power ups, and new themes to suit your mood in Classic Mode.

Or swipe over to Tempo Mode and get lost in music while you make swift matches and find your flow.

Finity will continue to expand and evolve over time, so look out for updates soon.

name: Dirty Texts: Melissa's Secret
description: In "Melissa's Secret" you play the role of a man whose girlfriend's daughter, Melissa, decided to start a JustFans page. A platform which she uses to sell sexy pics of herself. Since you're the closest thing she has to a male role model, it's your job to talk her out of it.

name: Titan Arum
description:
An eldritch romance horror visual novel created for the Velox Fabula 2023 Jam.

After years of being a ghost writer on the road, you get the opportunity to finally tell your own story. When your plans change unexpectedly, you end up moving into your family's recently bought home while they're away on vacation. Through chance encounters with people from your past, present, and a potential future interest, you explore the most pressing story you've ever told: your own.

name: Lucky Gem
description: Work with various sprites to collect gems of different colors and shapes, and help the sprites repair their home.

name: Dreaming in the Mountains
description: A dream and a question The game tells the story of a climber who enters a dream The player, as an abstract subject in the dream, experiences various dream slices hope you get something out of this

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Model Trainz - UZ-Gbox
description: It is a mini model railroad with a track gauge of 1520mm. The map is highly detailed and has a good variety of scenery. Includes 2 small sessions with passenger trains.

name: Football Stars Legend 24
description: Step onto the football field with Football Stars Legend 24, full of exciting football matches, realistic graphics and gripping tactics! Choose your favourite team, feel the fans' enthusiasm and start the match to embrace the victory.

name: Elis in Winterland
description: In Winterland, everyone is in a winter slumber, but summer has arrived. Can Elis, the only one to wake up, save Winterland?

name: Nature Escapes 4
description: Nature Escapes is back with another delightful assortment of enjoyable hidden object scenes!

name: Midnight Witch Starlight
description: A 90s anime inspired, wave based, 2D run and gun side scroller, where you are a magical girl on the side of light. Load out your arsenal of spells to free the legion of spirits corrupted by the legion of shadow.

name: George McGeehan Gamer Hero
description: George McGeehan wants to save a cat! Play this chill platformer by jumping up onto light fixtures and avoid annoying enemies!

name: Orbo's Odyssey
description: Orbo Stetson is just your average personal assistant. He files documents, he drafts up risk mitigation plans for new products, and he can launch himself like a .50 caliber bullet when prompted. On this fateful day, however, Orbo and his coworker Peeb find themselves in a bit of a predicament... The automatic door opener has been fried, and with the duo lacking a single arm between them, they are now trapped in their Boss's office. It's up to Orbo to scrounge up enough gear parts across 4 unique product portals to engineer a prosethetic arm so that he and Peeb may finally open the door and escape from this unsavory work environment...

name: Aonar
description: This is an immersive cinematic storytelling experience based on Scottish folklore. Become a part of the lighthouse keeper's story, and take a journey with him on the Scottish Isles. This is an exploratory application.

name: Hidden Series 1
description: Experience the engaging and addictive Hidden Series 1 game to find the hidden objects across 40 challenging levels. We have carefully crafted the puzzles which will give the ultimate challenges unlimited fun and allow you to relax.

name: Project Hardline
description: Project Hardline is a party first person shooter game where two teams fight to capture an uplink station. This uplink station contains vital intel and must not fall into the wrong hands. With every round a team faces, they will come back with better gear. This game is perfect for a party of friends.

name: Six Ages 2: Lights Going Out
description: Life after myths. Death, disaster, despair. A standalone survival-storybook combining interactive fiction and turn-based strategy. The world is ending, and your small clan's survival depends on how you manage its relationship with the remaining gods and their followers.

name: Survival & Horror: Hangman's Rope
description: Are you ready to uncover the secret of the cursed town? Immerse yourself in the ambiance of the Wild West and its mysterious events, and discover the truth about what lurks on the grim streets of this town.

name: Unholy Angel 2
description: Charming girls that want to test your brain Relax, clear your mind and enjoy

name: Towers of Thana
description: Towers of Thana is an action & strategy game where you invoke magic and summon towers to defend mythologies against a dark corruption. Travel to their homelands and rally legendary gods and creatures to your cause against Ogur, a God turned evil, and his corruption.

name: Jumplight Odyssey
description: Keep hope alive on your adventure to the mythical Forever Star! Gather survivors, repair and build out your starship, brave black holes, and fend off attacks, all while managing the daily soap opera of your colorful crew.

name: My Little Sister Fiona
description: My Little Sister Fiona is a short kinetic novel about a brother taking care of his reclusive little sister.

name: Yukar From the Abyss
description: A fantasy otome game based on the myths and legends of Hokkaido, Japan. Meet and fight with unique Gods, overcome fierce trials together, and discover what happens when you pursue forbidden love with the divine..

name: Paper Planet
description: Paper Planet is a planet-defender, arcade roguelike with a doodley, Flash-inspired artstyle. Battle through waves of unique enemies and bosses. Combine items with strange and wacky effects for insanely overpowered runs. Play with 1-4 players, for some chaotic co-op fun!

name: DepowerBall
description:
DepowerBall is a competitive party platformer where the fate of every matchup is influenced by fast-paced athletic gameplay and tactical decision-making.

Whether it’s feeding the hungry Dragon Queen or playing keep-away with a golden treat, every match, each player starts with the same set of powers to try and accomplish their task of becoming the Royal Champion! When a player wins a round, he or she will earn the Queen’s favor, but will also earn the wrath of the other players, who are then able to vote to take away one of the winner’s powers! Get ready to even the odds against your opponents as you take away the powers they hold most dear and hilariously watch how they deal with the consequences! Whoever is the first person to win three rounds, becomes the Royal Champion!
In the world of DepowerBall, you will need to adapt to the changing conditions, or get left behind as the other players take advantage of your weakened state!

name: A Little Piece of Healing
description: A mini-case by risefromtheashes. Inspired in part by Apples and Oranges and Gloria in Somnium.

name: Hamenos
description: Dive into Hamenos, the creation of a passionate independent solo game developer. Crafted for excitement and massive PvP battles, envision epic space clashes with thousands in the vastness of the space – yes, you read that right: 1000v1000+ space PvP battles await! Launch straight into the action from your browser.

name: Tails Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: Bender Kills Planet Express
description: Go insane in the mainframe as BENDER, everyone's favorite alcoholic robot from the year 3000! Give absolutely 0 craps as you bash, knife, shoot or set the Planet Express crew ablaze in this first person robotic murder sim based on the hit show "FUTURAMA"!

name: Transylmania Deluxe
description:
Vampy is back with a remake of the classic Flash game! Relive your childhood and revisit the castle!
Transylmania Deluxe is a remake of Transylmania, a game once available on Zeeks and Funschool.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Model Trainz - UZ-Gbox
description: It is a mini model railroad with a track gauge of 1520mm. The map is highly detailed and has a good variety of scenery. Includes 2 small sessions with passenger trains.

name: Trainz Plus: Model Trainz - UZ-Gbox
description: It is a mini model railroad with a track gauge of 1520mm. The map is highly detailed and has a good variety of scenery. Includes 2 small sessions with passenger trains.

name: Arrow a Row
description: Arrow a row is a game in which you shoot arrows (of course) in a row! or maybe two rows! (maybe three?) Choose your power-ups and defeat the Boss.
Each time you press the button, it will either double or lose all the points you've put in. How much will you risk?

name: Bushido Saga: Nightmare of the Samurai
description: Embrace the way of Bushido! Prepare for an Action-packed Adventure RPG game, as you step into the shoes of Oishi, an honorable Samurai. Engage in thrilling dynamic combat, embark on a gripping Saga, vanquish the forces of darkness, and uncover a sinister plot against Lord Asano.

name: Abyssey
description:
Abyssey is a strategy log-like game with Pixel Horizontal Scroll View!
Get jewelry and get a job! You get one job depending on the jewelry you're wearing!
Depending on your job, you will be able to use your own basic attacks and skills!
There are a total of 16 jobs, and you can experience new plays every time!
You can also gain item synergies, and item synergies can earn additional skills and stats to complement your job skills!
You can strengthen your items to make your current skills and synergy stronger!
There are more than 60 items. Try combine them in a variety of ways!
And, Beat enemies and bosses by creating my own synergy combination!

name: Kill The Crows
description: "Kill The Crows" is a fast-paced top-down arena shooter set in the twisted western era. A gunslinger burning with vengeance steps into the ruins of a forsaken town, ready to face death. Prepare for one-shot, one-kill gunfights using classic revolvers and fanning techniques.

name: Snowscapes
description: Snowscapes: a cozy city builder puzzle game where you craft a thriving arctic ecosystem. Balance animal needs while managing resources and unlocking new tiles. Relax with charming graphics and a soothing soundtrack while aiming for high scores. Perfect for all ages and skill levels.

name: Heartless & Dreadful: Return by 72 hours
description: Heartless and Dreadfull is a character action game, made mostly by one person. It features satisfying and fun combat. Featuring a short story campaign with multiple, brutal difficulty options, allowing for quite a bit of replayability. And a mode that would test your endurance to the max.

name: ShadowLight Siblings
description: Two brothers against a world deprived of its colors.

name: Life and Death: A Journey of Star-Crossed Lovers
description: Switch between life and death by pressing 1 and 2. Move using the arrow keys or WASD; can use space to jump as well. While playing as life, double jump or wall jump to get to death. While playing as death, use the shift keys to dash through slightly transparent walls.

name: Isle o' Little Men
description:
Isle o Little Men is a

3d,2d,point and click,action,adventure,visual novel EVERYTHING.

EVERYTHING PACKED IN ONE GAME. GAME OF THE YEAR 2023.

Made for 1-Bit Jam in 1 week

name: Phantom Shift
description: Sin descripción

name: Stripes
description:
Stripes is a Tetris-inspired puzzle game that requires players to strategically place stripe pieces to create a continuous loop beginning and ending at the starting point.

With increasing speed, players must use critical thinking and quick reflexes to connect the stripes before time runs out. With a sleek and colorful design, Stripes offers hours of entertainment for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages.

name: Befriending the Scarily Cute Fisherman
description: A 21-year-old who just wants to have fun and enjoy his youth, and a 31-year-old who's trying to get by and sell fishes for a living. The only thing they have in common is that they're awkward around each other.

name: Dayshift at Freddy's: Doggo Location improved
description: Almost 1 year after Jack and Dave made Freddy's Bakersfield location close down, A new location was opened. Apparently, Freddy Fazbender's decided to bring the Idaho location (#45) back. Now, this is where the fun begins.

name: Overload: First Strike
description: Community level pack that is a remake of Descent's (1994) campaign in Overload, including several balancing tweaks and a custom soundtrack.

name: Fireblue Jam
description: A once-sealed evil has found new life in the realms of Quake! Blast your way through 11 maps featuring the most infamous texture from DOOM, FireBlu! Made using Dumptruck_ds's Speedmapping Progs

name: Dolan Reborn
description: In Dolan Reborn, random people are disappearing all over, and it's up to you to stop that. Take control of Dolan and go to various locations to pinpoint the person responsible for this. In this journey, you will encounter difficult obstacles, enemies, and bosses so do your best to get to the final act.

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 3
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki going to the gym on a Saturday morning, attempting to seduce her new smoking hot trainer for a quickie, despite her husband’s reluctance.

name: Lost Civilization 2
description: 7 maps with ending scene and a secret map.The gameplay is mainly exploration with small fights here and there. More shooting in the end. You can solve some puzzles or not, those are mostly optional. Gameplay is easygoing. Nothing for Doom-veterans (easy). Has a little scarier moments to spice things up.

name: Tales of Fearless online
description:
Tales of Fearless is a 2D Hardcore Old School MMORPG with Medival and Fantasy style
With pixelated graphics that beats that nostalgia feeling of old games like Tibia, FFIV, and Zelda.
Made by a lover of old 2D games, Tales of Fearless has over 8 years of development.

name: Rescue Team 911 Simulator: Ambulance, Police, Firefighter
description: Where Heroes Rise and Hope is Restored: Rescue Team in Action!

name: FR Master: Formula Racing Simulator
description: Become a Racing Legend in FRMaster: Your Journey to Greatness Starts Here!

name: Witch Hunter Izana
description: Witch Hunter Izana is a bite sized transformation RPG! Take control of a zealous hunter sent to assess an island cut off from the outside world. Joined by a Knight-Errant and a Hedge-Witch, Izana will hack, slash, and shoot to release the island from the transformative grasp of sinister monsters.

name: Heartwood Online
description: Heartwood Online is a cross-platform free-to-play MMO. Explore a vast world filled with adventure where you choose your own path. Immerse yourself in crafting, trade, PvP & PvE battles, guilds, politics, and a thriving player economy.

name: Dimensionals
description: Dimensionals is an RPG that combines fast paced, action packed tactics with deep rogue-like replayability. Collect powerful heroes and fight epic bosses. Every run is unique, so equip your heroes carefully to pull off insane combos. Dimensionals is a total reimagining of the rogue-like genre!

name: GanaBlade
description: This is a hot barrage shooting game. Destroy enemy planes with powerful firepower, shuttle and evade in the barrage. Various scenes with rich colors Planets, Fire Stars, Jupiter Stars, Water Stars, and huge battleships. It's time to drive a space fighter and show your strength! !

name: Eris Dysnomia
description: In a world of monsters and peril, Eris finds herself alone with nothing but her trusty scythe. To save herself from the onslaught of enemies, she must kick and punch her way out of danger and defeat the enemies that stand in her path to salvation.

name: Sex Hotel Simulator
description: Sex Hotel Simulator is an adult Visual novel with the mechanics of pumping a hotel . Welcome to the captivating world of "Sex Hotel Simulator," where you'll take on the role of a brothel owner and elevate it to the pinnacle of fame and success!

name: Plumber Bundle 3 in 1
description: Introducing the ultimate Plumber Bundle, a collection of three challenging puzzle games that will put your skills to the test and provide hours of entertainment.

name: Last Broadcast
description: Last Broadcast is a 3D narrative game set in a small radio station at the end of the world. Players assume the role of D-Jay, a charismatic radio host who is giving their last show as the sun turns red and the world burns down.

name: Skyfighter Arcade
description: SkyFighter Arcade harkens back to the classic top-down shoot-em-up vertical scrollers, with modern day rogue-like twists. Test your reaction and maneuvering skills by blasting enemies out of the sky. Upgrade your Skyfighter and customize your loadout with upgradeable weapons and combo attacks.

name: Mtion studio
description: Create, play, and remix immersive 3D experiences with mtion—where you can bring immersive stories to life without coding. Build interactive worlds, publish with ease, and connect with a vibrant community across platforms like Twitch and YouTube.

name: Copper Jacket
description: Alert! Your former boss -- Commander Zaslavsky -- has kidnapped your wife-to-be in an attempt to make you do his dirty work. Your mission is to defeat this sinister commander and rescue the love of your life. Your best mate, Anatoly, has agreed to help you on your mission. You may really need his help as the journey will be rife with many challenges and obstacles to overcome. Zaslavsky has many men under his command as well as many war machines at his disposal. You must navigate through his defenses to reach his command center that rests atop a snowy mountain – it is here in which your beloved one is being held hostage. In addition to overseeing a powerful army, Zaslavsky is rather manipulative, so you should be cautious if he tries to communicate with you on your radio. Blast your way through 13 levels and 5 bosses in this brand-new, action-packed, 1-2 player NES game!

name: Erinaceinae Griminance
description: You walk into your dimly, yet surprisingly well lit, office after completing another case. Just as you think your work is over for today and you might finally have time to rest, a new client knocks away your dreams of relaxation and presents you a case unlike any you have seen before.

name: The College Brickout
description: Get ready to experience the ultimate gaming adventure with THE COLLEGE BRICKOUT. This game features popular artist Kanye West as the protagonist, where players have to help him navigate through various challenges and obstacles to reach his ultimate goal, with it's new and sealed packaging, this game is a must-have for any video game enthusiast. The game is compatible with PlayBlocks 2 and promises hours of entertainment and fun. So, gear up and get your hands on the most exciting game of the year, THE COLLEGE BRICKOUT!

name: Bad Flesh
description: A small game made for #lowrezjam23 that missed the deadline. Too busy eating bad flesh.

name: Kingdoms: Merge & Build
description: Match things to rebuild your kingdom in this puzzle game exclusive to Apple Arcade.

name: Spark Spark
description: Sin descripción

name: Asterigos: Curse of the Stars - Collectors Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kukuevo
description: Kukuevo is a unique experience for those who are interested in mysterious stories and love visual novels. Get ready for an exciting adventure in a world of riddles and mysteries, in which your every move can determine the outcome of the game.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Chainsaw Skin Variants
description: Show off your twisted personality with these three new skins for Leatherface's chainsaw! Includes the Pristine, Stickers, and Rusty variants. Slaughter with style!

name: Night Freak
description: A retro style horror game with silent hill style camera, tank controls, vhs filters, and survival horror elements.

name: Path of Exile: Trial of the Ancestors
description:
In this expansion, you will visit the Karui afterlife and defeat ten tribes in a series of tournaments to earn valuable new rewards.

Our August expansion introduces the Trial of the Ancestors challenge league, 16 new Atlas keystones, reworks of the Guardian and Chieftain Ascendancy classes, 14 new support gems and the return of a fan-favourite past league, The Forbidden Sanctum.

name: Stack Ball Run!
description: Stack Ball Run! is a 3D arcade game where you smash, push and jump over rotating spiral platforms to get to the end.

name: Eroblast: Passion Edition
description:
In this bundle you get content from the base game and Passion Pack which includes:
- 21 romanceable women to meet
- 120+ hot pics to unlock
- over 30 routes to go with each waifu, with between 5.000 to 10.000 words each
- 280 levels to beat
- 25+ hours of gameplay so get ready for flirting and pics!

name: Railroad Corporation: Competitive Spirit DLC
description: This DLC is a set of different sandbox missions featured with AI competitors. A special interactive mode is available for a relaxed and interesting long-time play.

name: The Final Pin
description:
"The Final Pin" is a full length story based game with voice acting and horror elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
You'll need to use your investigative skills and survival instincts to navigate the treacherous world of the crow killer and uncover the truth behind the town's dark past.
Each step you take is a closer step into the darkness.

name: Sun Lotion On My Curvy Asscheeks
description:
Sun Lotion On My Curvy Asscheeks is a 5-map episode for the Supercharge gameplay mod. The maps are laidback and quick, with the episode taking no more than 30 minutes. Take a shot of that late summer heat if you didn't get enough sun somehow.
Difficulties supported. Co-op has 4 spawn points but no additional enemies or items

name: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk: Base & Jay
description: Two new writers, Base and Jay, are coming in from out of town to support the BRC crew.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Slaughter Family Execution Pack 1
description: Unleash terror on your Victims with these new gut-wrenching executions for the Slaughter Family! This pack features one kill each for Leatherface, The Cook, The Hitchhiker, Sissy, and Johnny. Happy hunting!

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws Pack: Variety Pack 10
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Hexceed: Metallicum Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Metallicum Puzzle your way through 200 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Pirate Bloopers
description: Pirate Bloopers is an isometric action game in the style of "time survival" where you take a control of a ship in the dangerous waters of the Pirate Bay. The sea is calling!

name: Fantasy Defenders Bundle: Defend the Rook & Legend of Keepers
description: Experience two fantasy turn-based strategies: Card Battle Legend of Keepers and Defend the Rook - a roguelike tactic.

name: Tetherlure
description: Trouble brews when Princess Tsgodyn and her faithful knight Wahl get tossed in their own dungeon. Even worse - they're stuck together by giant magical handcuffs. Lift, pull and face-splat your way back to the castle, or cry trying.

name: Sushi Blast
description: Sushi Blast is a vertical jumping arcade game where you progress to the top by jumping on various platforms. Blast away enemies and collect powerups on your path to Sushi Greatness!

name: A Murder of Crows
description: Try to get all the crows before disaster comes for you

name: Extreme Bus Driver Simulator
description: Are you ready to become an experienced bus driver? Experience the thrill of transporting passengers in a realistic city with Extreme Bus Driver Simulator! Get passengers to their destination on time and safely, earn rewards and customize your bus.

name: Episode 666
description: Delve into the spine-chilling world of "Spirits Uncovered" where you will accompany the fearless YouTube Ghost Hunting sensation, Scott Warren. Scott is excited that after years of building his YouTube following, he has finally hit Episode 666!

name: Antipsychotic
description: This non-linear, immersive docu-music album aims to help destigmatize mental illness by allowing the user to journey through the mind of an individual with bipolar disorder.

name: Pan's Survivor Chess
description: This is a auto-battler & vampire-suvivor like game.

name: Rhino Runner
description: Runner Game where Rhino needs find balloons in different maps and avoid deathly traps.

name: Airplane Race Simulator 2 Player Game
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping world of Airplane Race Simulator - 2 Player Game, where you can experience the joy and excitement of racing airplanes in captivating environments. This highly enjoyable game offers a thrilling race experience with different locations, game modes, and a versus mode that takes the enjoyment to new heights.

name: Coloring Pixels: R/Place 2023 Pack
description: This Free book unlocks additional levels for Coloring Pixels! As a thank you to our community for getting our logo into the r/place board this year multiple times, we have put together a free DLC of all the various Toastielabs logos we managed to get throughout the whole event.

name: Hexceed: Ventus Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Ventus Puzzle your way through 111 new levels - All levels include the brand new "Donut" mechanic!

name: Hentai Pussy 7
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Mile High Taxi: Race Mode
description: Buckle up for Mile High Taxi's "Race Mode" DLC! Engage in pulse-pounding races, blast through the city at 400kph with InstaBoosts, and outpace rival hover cabs in this free, high-octane expansion!

name: I Commissioned Some Bunnies 2
description: I paid artists to hide bunnies and carrots in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5 - Collector's Edition
description: "Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5" is a hidden object game that offers you an exciting journey through 15 beautiful European countries. During the game, you will find interesting objects in historical places of Europe and Scandinavia, play exciting mini-games and collect tons of objects souvenirs.

name: Deckweaver: Descent Into Chaos
description: Deckweaver: Descent into Chaos is a first person deckbuilding game where the player crafts their abilities using different cards they find in the environment. Obliterate forces of chaos, fighting through corrupt locations in the world before getting the chance to face and defeat Chaos itself.

name: Dark Desire Mute 6
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire Plus
description: "Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire" the solitaire game with Klondike rules, is now available in a powered-up version! Play solitaire against 11 beautiful girls, from cool beauties to tsundere ladies!

name: Surreal House
description: A point-and-click puzzle game inspired by escape rooms. Enter the house if you dare.

name: Ducky Bouncy
description: Embark on an exciting journey in a bubble to get to help a duckling you found who has lost its familly.

name: Evil Officer
description: Escape the haunted house before the vengeful "Evil Officer" claims you. Only 5 days, cunning, and stealth will save you. Can you survive the horror and outsmart the relentless pursuit? Beware, he hears everything!

name: Squidding Over It
description: Get as high as you can with this slippery and clumsy squid. But be careful that if you stumble you may slip back to where you started!!

name: Project Third Eye
description: Enter the groundbreaking world of Project Third Eye, a VR physics game where creativity meets interactivity. Build anything with powerful tools and add logic using the visual scripting panel. Embark on an immersive adventure of endless possibilities. Get your copy now!

name: Hazy Monochrome Wand
description: A roguelite action game drawn in black and white pixel art. Operate a magic wand that uses actions such as "time stagnation", "time leap", and "explosion magic", Break through randomly connected dungeons

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas
description: Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Cat’s Cosmic Atlas takes you through the Southern and Northern skies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn a thing or two about the vast Universe that surrounds us.

name: Girls Rest
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Viking Hiking
description: Viking Hiking is a cheerful 3D Platformer. Join Bøf on his adventure to reach Valhalla. Jump, dash and use the horn as you explore a lush but challenging island! Viking Hiking is a FREE game made by second year students from Breda University.

name: Clover Day's Plus
description:
Bottled-up emotions... An everlasting oath... Heartfelt desires... An enduring regret... And a childhood promise. Yuuto was abandoned by his parents and raised in an orphanage in Britain before a trading merchant by the name of Takakura Yoshiomi adopted him and brought him to Japan.

Clover Day's Plus is the Steam release of the remake of Clover Day's.

name: Love Yuri
description: Shu Yu, a popular writer, became sisters with Lu Xi, an online voice actress. But when Lu Xi accidentally discovers that her favorite yuri author is actually her sister Shu Yu, she becomes increasingly attracted to Shu Yu's personality and a forbidden romance gradually unfolds between them...

name: Madden NFL 24
description: Experience the newest iteration of FieldSENSE in Madden NFL 24. More realistic character movement and smarter AI gives you control to play out your gameplay strategy with the confidence to dominate any opponent.

name: Galaxy Kingdoms
description: Galaxy Kingdoms is an action/adventure shooter. Control a bounty hunter exploring the galaxy in search of lucrative and dangerous bounties. Do profitable missions, upgrade your character, buy new weapons, explore planets in search of treasures and get more and more loot

name: Voidborn
description: Voidborn is a fast-paced roguelite FPS that combines skill-based action and swift movement with roguelike level progression and character customization. Rip apart demons with devastating weapon builds and reach as far as possible before you inevitably perish and become reborn stronger than ever.

name: Fogel and Porki Evil Arcade
description: This is a game in the genre of "Match 3" with elements of a visual novel, drawn in the aesthetics of retrofuturism of the 80s. Immerse yourself in the neon atmosphere of the arcade arcade and help the students defeat the Demon that broke into reality from the video game!

name: Retchid
description: The TEC Mining facility on Titan has been over run by beings from another universe. Grab your shotgun and stop this madness.

name: Rote2: RoteSquare
description: A 6-key vertical scrolling rhythm game with a unique mechanic that allows notes to take up any number of lanes.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
description: Take on the role of one of the notorious Slaughter family, or their victims, in The Texas Chain Saw Massacre, a third-person asymmetrical horror experience based on the groundbreaking and iconic 1974 horror film.

name: Lawgivers II
description: Lawgivers II is a political sandbox game which offers multiple ways to experience the process of ruling and approving bills. Start your political adventure from the very bottom and perhaps one day, lead your nation to become the most influential in the world.

name: Daisy Flies to the Moon
description: A sci-fi RPG that takes you to the Moon and beyond!

name: Amid Evil: The Black Labyrinth
description:
A full prequel involving the journey to and the trial of the Black Labyrinth itself!

Defeat the keeper of the legendary “Axe of the Black Labyrinth” which will bestow the title of ‘Champion’ upon anyone that can retrieve it.

name: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk
description: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk, an indie action-adventure platformer, features 1 second per second of highly advanced funkstyle. In a world where self-styled crews are equipped with personal boostpacks, new heights of graffiti are reached. Start your own cypher and dance, paint, trick, face off with the cops and stake your claim to the extrusions and cavities of a sprawling metropolis in an alternate future.

name: Labyrinthine
description: Uncover the dark secrets of an overgrown maze with friends online as you try to escape the horrors within. Together, you will need to solve puzzles, find items and run from the bloodthirsty denizens of the maze as you try and get out alive...

name: Dungeon X Dungeon
description: Arcadia 's best treasure hunter Luke is a dungeon hunter to prevent the resurrection of the Evil! We invite you to the world, which is filled with interesting stories, encounters with friends, action games that will defeat invulnerable monsters and use various elements to get through the dungeons.

name: Crestfall
description: Turn based strategy game of capture the flag. All pieces are hidden at the start

name: Prettyboy Inc. is Hiring!
description: A short horror visual novel about a job interview.

name: Labyrinth of Eclipse
description:
Arcade style roguelite where you fight demons an angels to try to stop a cults leader from ascending to god hood.

Made for the 2023 1 bit gamejam

name: BattleGlide
description: BattleGlide is an open world sandbox game where you can move and fight like a super hero.

name: Smithing Master
description:
Monsters rampage freely, and the world is filled with crises. You have become a part of this adventure.
You are a legendary smithing master who possesses the essence of forging and a valiant hero shouldering a heavy responsibility, fighting alone.
With determination, you embark on a journey to vanquish monsters and the Seven Deadly Sins, fighting to restore this fantastical world.

name: Spellbounce
description: Welcome to Spellbounce, a casual arcade game where you control a witch and shoot bouncy magical shots to defeat enemies in various levels. Precision and timing is key!

name: Hitman 3: The Sarajevo Six
description: Get access to the Sarajevo Six Campaign in Hitman World of Assassination and take on six bonus contracts that tell a self-contained side story which revolves around former members of a paramilitary unit called CICADA.

name: Destiny Saga
description: Sixteen years ago, the Montereys continent suffered a disaster from the Xorc crisis. The protagonist Rosen, with only a clue - a core chip from sixteen years ago, explores the continent again with his friends, trying to find out the cause of the crisis.

name: Phasmophobia: Ascension
description: This massive update includes an all new progression system, introduces equipment upgrades for every item in the game, overhauls the game's tutorial, and moves the whole experience to a new branch of the Unity engine for improved overall performance in game.

name: Idol Land PriPara
description: Mobile Rhythm Game from Takara Tomy Arts.

name: Eurydice Exhumed
description: orpheus descends into the underworld to retrieve his beloved. made for single choice jam.

name: Zombie Outbreak: Survival in Ancient Egyptian
description: Immerse yourself in ancient Egypt as you've never seen it before: Ravaged by a zombie apocalypse. Your survival depends on every choice you make in this engrossing horror game.

name: The Nightmare: Serial Killers
description: An astute killer infiltrates the dreams of his victims, sowing mental chaos until their death. Five days, five victims and multiple alternative endings.

name: Let's Build a Zoo: Aquarium Odyssey Bundle
description:
Experience Springloaded's Zoo management sim Let's Build A Zoo, alongside the newest DLC, Let's Build A Zoo: Aquarium Odyssey!

Construct and decorate enclosures, buy and breed animals, hire zookeepers and vets... then try your hand at DNA splicing!

name: One-Two Combo Bundle: Punch Club Franchise
description: Enjoy the ultimate Punch Club experience in this knockout bundle!

name: Red Dead Redemption & Red Dead Redemption 2 Bundle
description: This bundle includes Red Dead Redemption, Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare, Red Dead Online, and Red Dead Redemption 2: Story Mode.

name: Seven Steps to Limbo
description: Created for a game jam with the restriction of allowing only one choice in the game, Seven Steps to Limbo is a cinematic visual novel about a group of jazz players who are stuck in purgatory.

name: World War 1: Ruined Part 1
description: Embark on an enigmatic odyssey with "RUINED Part 1" DLC. Uncover secrets in a decaying world, battling foes and moral quandaries. Enhanced visuals, immersive gameplay, and a haunting soundtrack await. Redefine your understanding of "RUINED" in this gripping expansion.

name: Gord: Hold Your Ground
description: Defend your gord against increasingly stronger waves of enemies. No one knows what wicked things lurk beyond the veil of darkness. We must prepare our defences and brace for the coming onslaught. May we all have the fortitude to survive what is to come.

name: Warstone TD: Gold Edition
description: Warstone is a Tower Defense game with RPG elements, strategy and city building. A dreaded chieftain is assembling an army intent on taking over the kingdom. The villagers call for a hero, help them stand up against the forces of this feared villain. The hero is you!

name: Crash Dive 2 - Aleutian Islands Expansion
description: Includes one campaign, two new mission areas, four new ships, one new plane, and more!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - 23rd World Tournament
description: Experience the story that leads to the main plot of Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot and the 23rd World Tournament, where many upheavals took place! The title of Tenkaichi begins now! Goku and Ma Junior battle for the fate of the world.

name: Arcade Archives: Dark Adventure
description:
"DARK ADVENTURE" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1987.
Our heroes in this title have been sucked into the Devil World after they opened an ancient coffin found in some ruins.
Now, they must set out on an adventure through the labyrinthine Devil World to find the demon king, defeat him, and make their way home.
This title includes a Japanese Version, European Version, and also a North American Version that allows 3-player co-op.

name: Holocure: Update 0.6
description:
This update hasn't been fully revealed but is set to add 9 new characters from Hololive Indonesia generation 1, 2 and 3 with related items and stages.

The main new content added in this update is Holo House, a hub area with minigames, stores and a house area to customize. It has cooking, fishing, farming, NPC recruitment based on character mascots and various new challenges that can unlock additional furniture items for the house.

name: Fallen Prince
description: Fallen Prince is an atmospheric combat-focused metroidvania with retro elements. Explore a bleak undead zone, hone your skills and rid the kingdom from your brother's vile sorcery.

name: Gauntler
description: Avoid numerous dangers using the power of Mystical Gauntlets and make your way to the summit, braving increasingly harder challenges.

name: Satay Shop Tycoon
description: Grow your satay business and become the most successful satay entrepreneur in the world!

name: Hidden Shapes: Cat Realm + Trick or Cats
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Hidden Shapes: Cat Realm + Trick or Cats, and experience the beauty of transforming shapes into mesmerizing art!

name: G-Scramble
description: Vertical Scrolling 2D Shooting Game Created by Shooting Game Builder

name: Red Dead Redemption
description: A bundle containing ports of Red Dead Redemption and the Undead Nightmare expansion missing multiplayer components and including some parts of the GOTY release.

name: Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare
description: A port for the Switch and PS4 lacking multiplayer modes present in the original release.

name: Red Dead Redemption
description: A port for the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Windows. It lacks the multiplayer modes present in the original release.

name: Two Point Campus: Medical School
description: Enroll in Medical School today! Join wandering paramedic Vitality Johnson to cure the sick, tackle pesky pirates, and embrace yeti wisdom. Your adventures in medicine start here!

name: Aery: Flow of Time
description: Enjoy a combat-free journey through colorful worlds and search for the cure! Lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying.

name: Darker Skies: Remastered for PC
description: Darker Skies comes fully remastered to PC. Incorporating new graphical features and gameplay enhancements for the definitive way to play Darker Skies. Survival Horror set after the War of the Worlds.

name: Mystery Box: Evolution
description: Enjoy the 3rd chapter of the 'Mystery Box' puzzle game series! Unlock 57 boxes by solving tons of intriguing riddles that will put your brain to work

name: Only Up: With Friends
description: Only Up: With Friends is a multiplayer parkour game where speed is essential. Race against your friends to the top by climbing a variety of dynamic obstacles. One mistake and its back to the start...

name: Space Ball VR
description: Play a fun game of Space Ball with your friends! Football, basketball, handball: any mode you like is available in this sporty and dynamic game.

name: Quantum: Recharged
description: Dodge and encircle your enemies in this neon-drenched revival of the one-of-a-kind arcade classic!

name: Marble It Up! Ultra
description:
Marble It Up! Ultra is the pinnacle of marble platforming from the minds behind Marble It Up! and Marble Blast. World-class level design, buttery-smooth controls, gorgeous visuals, and exhilarating multiplayer - welcome to the ultimate marble experience!

Roll through an extensive single-player campaign filled with dangerous obstacles, mind-bending paths, shifting gravity, bouncy floors, and potent power-ups.

Embrace the five competitive and chaotic multiplayer modes. Team up to hunt gems, score goals, escape zombies, and prove your marble mettle online. Blast your way to glory!

Unlock a magnificent collection of marbles, trails, and hats! Find hidden trophies, earn medals, and play online - all while earning your next piece of marble fashion.

Push yourself to the next level. Hunting achievements and climbing the Global Leaderboards are sure-fire ways to become a marble master! Weekly Challenges add new modifiers to levels for a fresh new way to compete each week!

Get ready to roll!

name: An Ankou
description: Recently deceased and chosen as the Ankou, help lost souls to leave the world of the living with the tools of your old trade. Roam haunted lands to find resources, craft equipment and slay hordes of demons in this action-exploration roguelike.

name: Treasure Chest Clicker
description: Click chests, collect loot. Buy new chests and keep clicking! You will be rewarded gold, XP, rare loot and ultra rare loot each time you open a chest.

name: Top Villain: Total Domination
description: How would you conquer the world? In this text-based supervillain rpg, you can vanquish your nemesis, fight heroes and villains, and find yourself!

name: Sword Collector
description: This is an exhilarating 3D action RPG featuring huge boss battles.

name: Let’s Build a Zoo: Aquarium Odyssey
description: Escape to a brand new AQUARIUM ISLAND and discover a world of seafaring beasts. Start a brand new zoo complete with adorable water splashing and ocean dwelling creatures, brand new themed shops and a whole host of new decorations to give your guests the ultimate aquatic experience!

name: I Expect You to Die 3
description: Outwit your most cunning adversary to date in the latest installment of this award-winning, spy-themed VR puzzle series. Wield new gadgets, visit action-packed locales, and wear custom disguises as you dive back into the world of espionage in this escape room game.

name: Controller
description: Controller is a light Tower Control simulator. Use a simplified instruction system to manage movements of planes around an Airfield. Dynamic hazards will keep on you your toes and force you to alter your plans on the fly. Do you have what it takes to manage the busiest airports in the world?

name: Fuzzy Flip
description: Colorful and huggable, the Fuzzies invite you to join their exciting puzzle quest to make everybody happy! Tap on the multi-hued cubes and create amazing color combinations to reach the next gorgeous level. Enjoy a huge variety of puzzle modes and challenges, all with simple tap controls.

name: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew
description: Welcome to the Lost Caribbean! In this stealth strategy game, join a ghost ship with a living soul and assemble a cursed pirate crew. Embrace magical powers to defy the menacing army of the Inquisition, who stands between you and the mysterious treasure of the legendary Captain Mordechai.

name: Dwarves: Glory, Death and Loot
description: Create your fully customizable army of dwarves and lead them to victory! Strategize with up to 10 individual beardlings in this combination of classic RPGs, roguelikes and auto-battlers. Forge your own path and decimate orcs, fight trolls or battle dragons - There will be Glory, Death and Loot!

name: Mist Slayer
description: Mist Slayer is an action Roguelite game. You play as a time traveler with unique weapon and skills, fighting against different kinds of enemies in parallel universes, collecting various power-ups, and exploring the world. You can play with your friends, or on your own.

name: Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts
description: Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts Survival & Horror Game Set in September 1993, the first episode begins with four friends searching for an artifact. They have no difficulty in realizing that something is wrong here, this is the site of the Root Experiment mentioned in conspiracy theories. There is only one thing left for the rest, to survive and not to be afraid if it is possible...

name: Hot Guns: International Missions
description: Your conventional methods of operation are "shoot first then shoot again!"

name: Ashen Knights: One Passage
description: Two heroes, two different genres: souls-like & hack’n’slash. They switch places and trigger a wild emotional storm making sure you never get bored of playing. Assay your strength and stamina as a defender of the Abyss-devoured world. Be merciless yet cautious in Ashen Knights: One Passage.

name: Affogato
description: Affogato combines RPG and 'reversed tower defense' elements. You'll play as the titular Affogato, a sorceress managing a cafe in a new town. Meet all kinds of customers, hear their stories—and travel into their minds to defeat their inner demons. Experience a city life both everyday, and magical.

name: Dummy Falls
description: Dummy Falls is a co-op game where you and your teammate tries to overcome various obstacles until the end.

name: Final Fantasy XI Braver
description: A sprawling adventure in the world of Vana'diel.

name: Hello Engineer
description: Unleash your creativity in a multiplayer machinery-construction game in the Hello Neighbor universe! Scavenge, craft, and overcome challenges in the bizarre world of a mysterious amusement park. Put together incredible machines built of scrap, and challenge your creepy Neighbor and his evil bots.

name: Gord
description: Gord is a single-player, adventure-strategy game featuring developing societies, eerie forbidden lands, and remarkable mythical creatures. Complete quests and manage a populace whose personal stories and well-being impact the fate of the settlement.

name: Book of Hours
