description: Book of Hours is an elegant, melancholy, combat-free RPG set in an occult library, from the makers of BAFTA-nominated Cultist Simulator and the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea.

name: Pelagicland
description: Pelagicland is a nautical-themed idle MMORPG

name: Number Sums
description: Number Sums is a challenging number puzzle to train your mental arithmetic. The goal is to make the sum of numbers in each row and column be equal to the clues on the side of the board.

name: Skibidi.io
description: Your goal is to eat, grow and evolve! As you grow and evolve, you will unlock special abilities and powers to help you in your quest for victory.

name: Baryoland
description: Baryoland is a whimsical rage platformer starring baryo, a cluster of atoms shaped like a cat. He must collect the quarks and avoid the antiquarks.

name: SolarBlack
description: SolarBlack is an action-rhythm game made exclusively for VR where you slice and shoot to the beat to defeat an other-worldly threat. Immerse yourself in new worlds and experience the music in every pulsating atom.

name: Art Reborn: Painting Connoisseur
description: Dear curator, you are about to embark on a journey to captivate the audience! You will be in charge of an art gallery.Impress the museum curators around the world with these masterpieces, collect badges, apply for support funds, and learn the value of art!

name: Rusty Ride
description: Take the wheel as a gritty veteran in a jetpack-equipped car with a tank cannon. Traverse dynamic, procedurally generated landscapes, obliterate obstacles, and unlock explosive upgrades. A thrilling, action-packed adventure awaits!

name: Race Manager
description: Become a race manager

name: Bocchi the Smash!
description: Bocchi the Smash! is a fan game of Bocchi the Rock! made by DCinside Bocchi the Rock Gallery.

name: Kitty Krawler
description:
Puzzle, action, friendship! Jazz the Cat is up to visiting Jeenxie the Kitty. Climb the vine and crawl your way to the window where your friend lives. Wait, but Jazz is afraid of heights!
And of spiders, and of many other hazards...
Could Jeenxie help maybe? Would you help them both?!

name: DCS World: Mi-24P The Border Prequel Campaign by Armen Murazyan
description: In the summer of 2015, the Russian Aerospace Forces achieved significant results in the fight against terrorist groups on the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic (SAR).

name: Across The Obelisk: Sands of Ulminin
description: The Sands of Ulminin await you and your friends now. Delve into the desert canyons, solve the mysteries of the pyramids, and discover what lurks beneath, with two new heroes, a new zone, dungeons, and new events to explore!

name: WWE 2K23: Bad News U Pack
description: The Bad News U pack includes Wade Barrett & Eve Torres, as well as NXT Superstars Damon Kemp, Andre Chase, & Nathan Frazer. Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFaction card. The Bad News U Pack is included with the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: Across The Obelisk: Sands of Ulminin
description: In this latest DLC, players will delve into desert canyons, solve the mysteries of the pyramids, and discover what lurks beneath, with two new heroes, a new zone, dungeons, and new events to explore.

name: Carousel
description: Ready to start unlocking your puzzle skills? Come on, challenge and bring the beautiful image back to full display!

name: Embattled
description: Embattled is a fast-paced one-button game. You are constantly moving up and down while enemies on both sides are shooting at you and approaching your position. To change your direction, press a button or hit the top or the bottom of the screen. Hold a button to stay still and put up shields to protect yourself from enemy shots. But when you have the shields up enemies shoot faster and move towards you. Try to avoid enemy shots and make them hit each other to score points. The game is over when an enemy shot hits you.

name: Dungeon Survival
description: A side-scrolling, turn-based character development game, where you play as a lord leading your heroes to brave the depths of dungeons.

name: Invention 4
description: Save the world from an impending threat in a dynamic 3D shooter with quest and puzzle elements.

name: Akui: The Insane Cultists
description: A fist person horror adventure in a dark parallel world peppered with monsters and puzzles.

name: Mystical Riddles: Ship From Beyond - Collector's Edition
description: All hands on deck! A strange, oily fog has enveloped the waterfront of the port town of Quietcape, where local fishermen go, never to return again... Can you solve this mystery?

name: Bot Crisis
description: A funny 3D online game where you must identify real players from a group of bots. Don't forget to act as a bot yourself!

name: Unending
description: A roguelite-puzzle anthology.

name: Zombiflux: Sleepless War
description: Survive and create your own civilization!

name: Little Man Has a Day
description: A personal, short and silly handwritten game about a little man feeling a little 'eh'.

name: TaliVan
description: Gear up for an adrenaline-fueled adventure in a mesmerizing fictional desert like no other! Take control of an awe-inspiring super car in this exhilarating car game and buckle up for an exhilarating journey through treacherous terrains.

name: Genshin Impact: As Light Rain Falls Without Reason
description:
The third major update (Version 4.0) of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Lyney, Lynette and Freminet
• New region, Fontaine, with new areas: Belleau Region, Beryl Region and Court of Fontaine Region
• New gameplay mechanics: Underwater Exploration
• New combat mechanics: Arkhe (Ousia and Pneuma energy)
• New main story quests: Chapter IV, Acts I & II
• New story quest for Lyney
• New main event: Mega Meka Melee
• …and more!

name: Construction Machine Simulator 2023: Hard Truck Work Job
description: Become the owner of a bustling construction site: take control of powerful heavy machinery and a team of professionals!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Vecna Unleashed
description:
The mini-expansion introduces a climax to The Codex of the Infinite Planes Saga, where players must face the sinister presence of Vecna and his cult in Morgrave University.

Vecna Unleashed offers new adventures in various locations, including Sharn, the Plane of Water, the Abyss, and the Astral Plane. Players will battle against new monsters such as humanoid rodent Wererats and abyssal demonic Vrocks, while also unlocking a new Epic Destiny called the Machrotechnic.

name: Kemps
description: Kemps is a fast-paced online card game that brings together 4 to 8 players, divided into teams of 2, where players score points by secretly communicating to their partner when they have collected 4 of a kind. Utilize teamwork, deception, and keen observation to pave the way to victory!

name: Sender
description: The winds of the frozen wasteland are calling in this atmospheric horror game. Operate an aging vehicle to locate the missing driver of the previous expedition. Be careful not to stray from the path...

name: Pandora
description: Pandora is a third-person action-adventure hack n slash game that combines teleportation and combat abilities. Take on the role of Phase, a cyber-enhanced super-soldier detained by their creator, Sai-Corp. Escape the orbital testing facility and earn the freedom they stole from you long ago.

name: The Cosmic Wheel Sisterhood
description: Immerse yourself in an enchanting narrative experience as Fortuna, a fortune-teller Witch condemned to exile on her asteroid home. Craft your own Tarot deck, regain your freedom, and shape the fate of the cosmic Witch society.

name: Voidside
description: Voidside is a high-octane Parkour FPS in which you jump around locations pulled out of time, unlock strange new weapons and fight mysterious threats all while trying to get a high score!

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2
description: Dust off your torch and hammer - it's time to get back to work, you have a new job to do. Visit the new beach coast with the largest, biggest ship graveyard in the world, dismantle huge ship parts and collect tons of precious steel. Roll up your sleeves, it's time to get back to the business.

name: City of Murals
description: City of Murals is a cute and gross, action-platformer, rogue-lite. Explore a colorful world with violent and non-violent guns, special traversal abilities, and creatures that range from friendly to deadly. The world is competing to see who can live the longest. How long will you survive?

name: Stories of Blossom
description: Reawaken your inner child and explore the colourful worlds of Stories of Blossom. A series of wholesome adventures, brought to life by the imagination of a young girl.

name: Waven
description: Waven is a new roleplaying game experience that is accessible, fun and immersive. It combines adventure and turn-based strategy, inspired by the best tactical RPGs, with deckbuilding mechanics and valuable items to collect. It can be played for free online on PC, Mac, smartphone and tablet.

name: En Garde!
description: En Garde! is a swashbuckler action game! Battle graceless guards and nefarious noblemen in fast-paced fights full of spectacle. Use the environment, your wit and your blade to teach them all a lesson!

name: Kick To Hell
description: In Kick To Hell you control Jeremiah returning home from work, until after desecrating a ritual, inexplicable things start to happen and something starts to chase you.

name: Minecraft: 1st Animal Friends Skin Pack
description: The "1st Animal Friends" Skin Pack will charm you with its warm appeal. Using a rustic wardrobe and farm-themed accessories, you may create a character in a world full of charming farm animals and hardworking farmers.

name: Pursuit Force: Extreme Justice
description: This game is a sequel to the first Pursuit Force. This is a game which alternates between driving and shooting, in which you must keep Capital City safe from five ruthless and well-equipped gangs.

name: Hoshi no Meiling
description:
Get your hands on the legendary "Dragonstar"!
A 2D action game in the style of GameBoy.

name: MediEvil: Resurrection
description:
A port of MediEvil: Resurrection, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

MediEvil: Resurrection is a 2005 action-adventure game for the PlayStation Portable and is the third installment in the MediEvil video-game series. It is a reimagining of the first installment in the series, MediEvil, with many alterations to the original structure and content, such as the addition of the "Anubis Stone" sub-plot which never appeared in the original. Many things such as level design and characters were changed drastically, and some levels from the original were removed altogether. New levels and characters were introduced, the cutscenes are completely original, and the game was given a much more comical, cartoon-like style as opposed to the Gothic horror-comedy of the original. The soundtrack is completely orchestrated, and half of the themes from the original were removed while new themes were created to fit with the new levels. Unlike the original, there is no alternate ending; Dan still goes to the Hall of Heroes regardless of whether he collects all of the chalices. The game also features a variety of voice talent, including Tom Baker as the narrator and the Grim Reaper.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Magnificent Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Happy
description: Happy" is a psychological horror adventure game where you play as a detective investigating the disappearance of a family in an abandoned winter forest.

name: Trail Out: Luxury Life
description:
Experience the world of luxury with these expensive cars!

Surge Mc1 - is a rare British luxury sports car. Fast, expensive and crashes beautifully.

MASK X100 - A fully electric car. Luxurious design, quality build and optional autopilot.

Limonator II - Mr. President's personal limousine. Armored, heavy, and holding the brand.
As well as a bonus appearance of the main character.

name: Sudoku G1
description: Every day, a new challenge for you to challenge your brain while having fun!

name: Dito G1
description: Sin descripción

name: Three Minutes With Your Dog
description: Play with your trusty dog today! The sky is clear, the sun is shining and oh cool, theres a dog walking his huma-

name: The Tartine's Show
description: In a world made of toast, you are the best, the only one. You are part of

name: Hentai World: Complete Edition
description:
Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all puzzles. These lovely girls will keep you company.

In this bundle, you will see student Sayuri and Rose in her new feline look.

name: Xtreme Sports
description: The Xtreme Sports showdown has begun! Play as Guppi or her boyfriend Fin as they visit Xtreme Island and aim to become Xtreme Sports Champion by mastering five events - skateboarding, street luge, in-line skating,

name: Ape Escape: On the Loose
description: Experience Ape Escape: On the Loose originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Puzzle Room Escape
description: A quick and simple escape game. Escape from a room with puzzles.

name: The Conductor
description: A short horror game about a train journey and a descent into madness.

name: Moving Out + Moving Out 2 Bundle
description: This bundle includes Moving Out and Moving Out 2.

name: X-Pack
description:
X-Pack is a two-pack of old school games.
This package brings a mix of good gameplay, good music, nostalgia and a lot of Gamer Score

name: Citadale Resurrection: Darkness my Curse
description: DLC Pack for Citadale Resurrection. Darkness my Curse is alat 1980s handheld styled single-screen platformer.

name: Moving Out 2: F.A.R.Tastic Four Pack
description: The F.A.R.Tastic Four Pack adds four new movers to the Smooth Moves roster: Chum, Bastian, Hootacris and Cera Topps.

name: Glitch Busters: Boss Challenge Pack
description: This new endgame "Challenge Mode" pits you and up to 3 others against six bosses one after another--and of course comes with new customization parts, 15 in total.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Italian Exotics Car Pack
description: Collect 7 Italian new-to-Forza cars: 2023 Lamborghini Huracán Tecnica, 2022 Ferrari 296 GTB, 2020 Ferrari Roma, 2020 Lamborghini Essenza SCV12, 2020 Lamborghini SC20, 2019 Italdesign DaVinci Concept and 2018 Lamborghini #63 Huracán Evo.

name: Hammerwatch: Anniversary Edition
description: Choose between seven hero classes, each with unique capabilities. Brave hordes of deadly creatures alone, or band together with your noblest of champions in co-op mode available both online and locally. Take on the challenges in three different campaigns, or build your own custom scenario.

name: Succubus RoomMate
description: Enter a fascinating and seductive world with "Succubus RoomMate". In this addictive cookie clicker game, you can buy cute power-up imps and immerse yourself in a story inside the protagonist's room. Unlock scenes with your very own succubus and enjoy intense dialogues in pure anime style.

name: Sex Simulator: CamGirl Audition
description: A sex simulation game with visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a guy who is looking for models for his video chat studio.

name: Cavemen Tales: Collector's Edition
description: Help Sam and Crystal and their family to find a new home in this time management strategy game! Explore, guide the tribe, build, gather resources, overcome obstacles and enjoy the tale of family, friendship and courage!

name: She Fell Off
description: Uncover the cryptic remnants of a destroyed world in "She Fell Off," a solo-developed indie game. Embark on Eve's intense journey through a dark post-apocalyptic underworld, devoid of familiar life. Navigate a dark environment, endure unforgiving gameplay, and immerse yourself in an eerie mystery.

name: Stick and Balls
description: Stick and Balls is an exceedingly difficult climb up a minimalist tower. Control two balls, separately yet simultaneously, connected by a stick, with other physics shenanigans that are simple to learn, hard to master. The smallest mistake might lead you on a (psychologically) painful fall.

name: Dirt Bicycle Rider Simulator
description: Choose your bike, conquer the town and mountains! Test your skills in Dirt Bicycle Rider Simulator, packed with realistic graphics and exciting missions.

name: Astro Flame: Starfighter
description:
Astro Flame Starfighter is a classic scrolling shooter with modern 3D graphics.
Upgrade the systems of your spaceship, upgrade your weapons and sweep away hordes of enemies on your way.

name: Wizard Heist
description: The wizard isn't home. Can you steal his treasure and survive?

name: Haven's Compass
description: Haven's Compass is a Fast Paced but Tactical FPS with Hero Shooter elements that you can interchange!

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing - 23 Edition
description: The Official Game of The World of Outlaws, built in collaboration with iRacing!

name: Team Rise
description: Discover the fun of team climbing! Explore all the secrets, shortcuts and traps! Share this adventure as a team, or do it alone.

name: Rise for the Fight
description: A Cartoon Multiplayer FPS Game, where you can upgrade your guns by dealing damage or gaining multikills.

name: Madden NFL 24: Deluxe Edition
description: FieldSENSE : INCREASED CONTROL AND REALISM. More realistic character movement and smarter AI gives you control to play out your gameplay strategy with the confidence to dominate any opponent in Madden NFL 24.

name: Emergency
description: Save lives – be a hero! Join forces against the chaos in the newest title of the award-winning Emergency series. Take up your shift as incident commander and coordinate with other players to fight fires, arrest gangsters and rescue injured civilians. Your city needs you!

name: Everspace 2: Stellar Edition
description:
EVERSPACE 2: Stellar Edition Includes:
- Base game
- SteelBook case
- Digital original soundtrack.

name: Hammerwatch II
description: Gather your heroes and journey beyond the dungeons of Castle Hammerwatch to explore a pixelated world like never before. Aid King Roland’s resistance while helping villagers along the way. Battle beasts, finish off hordes of the undead, and face the forces of evil in this epic ode to classic ARPG.

name: War Thunder Mobile
description:
War Thunder Mobile is a brand new project that builds upon the success of the widely popular War Thunder game that has tens of millions of players worldwide and has set two Guinness World Records.

Utilizing the same Dagor cross-platform engine as War Thunder and other Gaijin games, War Thunder Mobile delivers first-class graphics and the latest technological advancements on all devices. The development of War Thunder Mobile is led by a new in-house team at Gaijin Entertainment, with guidance from the original War Thunder developers.

New nations and famous vehicles like Abrams tanks and MiG-29 jets will be coming to War Thunder Mobile via regular updates.

name: Moving Through Life
description: Together with the main heroine of the game, go through important stages of her life. Help her set up homes and feel her experience through her belongings. The game has simple rules and control: move items to where you think they should be. The game has no scores, time limits, or complex tasks.

name: The Fallen Night
description: Dominate the battlefield with your cold, ruthless warrior skills and engage in deadly battles.

name: Crank Tanks
description: A new take on the classic artillery game genre

name: Desynced
description: Desynced is a sci-fi strategy game with fully customizable units and behaviors. Gather, build, research, and explore the unknown. Alone or with friends, unveil the mystery of an AI on the edge of self-awareness and uncover the hidden truth in this blend of strategy, automation, and exploration.

name: Crash Mole
description: Crash Mole is a retro arcade game for Playdate!

name: Moving Out 2
description:
Moving Out 2 is a video game in which payers attempt to move objects across various levels without hitting objections. It combines elements of strategy, puzzles, and party video games.

It is a sequel to Moving Out.

name: PlayDice
description: Dice classics for the Playdate handheld!

name: Ultrafun
description: Nurture a colony of Voidlings in this wave-based rogue-lite. Collect gold, earn power-ups & buy upgrades to survive!

name: Tea Garden Simulator
description: Explore tea production intricacies with real-world research, select ideal terroir and clones, master plucking and processing, and create specialty teas for your unique brand. Unravel new flavors, unleash your inner tea scientist, experiment with endless creative ideas, and grow your Tea empire.

name: Black Skylands
description: Earth has been turned into thousands of flying islands. The survivors are at war for resources. You are an airship captain who wants to reach Black Skylands, a scavenger’s paradise. To do so you must destroy hordes of hostile monsters and find peace and prosperity for your people.

name: Cantata
description: Crash-landed in the universe of Cantata, will you expand your empire or bring peace to the war torn planet? Grow your army, manage resources and discover the colourful planet of Shoal, its people, and the armed forces overrunning this land in this genre-defining Grand Tactics game.

name: Astronaut: The Best
description:
Astronaut: The Best is an occult management sim where people aren't just numbers: they're incompetent screwups. Your duty is to turn them into national heroes, or the government will have you killed.

Traditionally, the space race is thought of as a gauche way to kill dogs using explosives, but you are expected to conduct your program with class (or be left dead in a ditch). Handle procedurally generated challenges and run a proper space academy using hard work, lies, and witchcraft.

name: Standbox
description: STANDBOX is a single-player physics sandbox about bullying a ragdoll. Shoot him, push him, watch him get back up until he doesn't.

name: Liminal Gallery
description: Liminal Gallery is a small experimental project with unusual mechanics, with which you can turn pictures into reality. Explore the different rooms in the gallery looking for the door to the next level. The game is short and takes 10-15 minutes.

name: Boykisser Mayhem
description: After being sucked inside of the internet, Boyfriend has to face another dead meme again, it's Boykisser! They shall both get into a rap fight to see who is the ultimate Boykisser!

name: Miamo.fun
description: Miamo.fun is a browser-based game that delves into the idiosyncrasies of internet culture and the gaming world. This game, with its first chapter now available and more chapters planned for future release, blends parody, meta irony, and shifting gameplay mechanics primarily rooted in point & click adventure elements.

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS Boykisser
description: Friday Night Funkin': VS Boykisser is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based on the Boykisser meme. The song features 1 week, with the song No More Boykisser based on the song No More Nuzzles from Undertale: Halloween Hack.

name: Blob Command: New Attack
description: Experience more blob action with power-ups and two player co-op!

name: Idle Void
description: Idle Void is an idle game about collecting particles within a black hole.

name: Mujina: Maze Game VR
description: Mujina is a Maze Exploration game where the player has to activate 4 objective points and reach the end portal. Beware of the monsters and the numerous traps awaiting you! If everyone dies, it will result in a failure! Group up with your friends to complete the 3 type of mazes!

name: Chaos Chain: Supporter Cosmetic Pack
description: The Supporter Cosmetic Pack is for people who'd like to show some extra support for Chaos Chain and the developers at Corrosive Studios and to help us continue to grow. As a thank you, you'll receive 8 unique skins to show off your style as you descend into the shadows of Slade City!

name: Object-37
description: The game takes place in the near future in Freak Squad's office. During the game, the player will to walk around the office, as well as meet one interesting streamer, who has changed a lot (or not so much) with time. The game is made in the escape-horror genre, where the player has to get out of a closed location, trying not to get caught by its unfriendly inhabitant. Of the tools, the player will only have a weak flashlight and his own microphone, with which he can open doors. However, it is worth remembering that the microphone can both help and harm, forcing you to pay too much attention to you.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XV: Little Big Adventure
description: Help Hercules free from the tiny folk's shackles and save Lilliputians' lands from a shadow-casting island floating in the sky!

name: Be the Richest
description: is a tycoon management game that inherits the classic gameplay of Richest #1. It introduces an exciting new stealing mechanism where you can get rich quick by stealing funds from tycoons to strengthen your own power.

name: Party Party Time + Ultra Pack Set
description:
The party never stops with the Party Harder Pack, Party Fever Pack, Party Even Harder Pack, Excitement Pack, and Happy Happy Pack downloadable content bundle for Party Party Time!
Gather everyone up and party happy, party on!

name: Orbit Zero
description: Create a Company, Build structures, Collect Resources, Make Investments and Speculate on Assets. Carefully manage your Workforce, Finances, Resources, Shareholders, BOD & Political Partnerships.

name: Finding America: The Great Lakes
description: Explore the beautiful areas surrounding the Great Lakes of America!

name: Real Motocross Driving Simulator
description: Get the real Motocross driving experience! Complete exciting missions, earn rewards and unlock new motorcycles.

name: Made in Hell
description: "Made in Hell" is a 2D pixel vertical scrolling action game. Throw bones and jump (warp). Throw a bone and keep climbing.

name: Pusher: Drug Tycoon
description: Thrilling business tycoon sim where you step into the shoes of a drug dealer in 1980s USA. Your main goal is simple: Buy low and sell high. Get ready for an experience where you'll combine strategy, risk-taking, and decision-making to build your criminal empire.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Egypt
description: Puzzles of Egypt!

name: Two Cubes
description: Two Cubes is an Online Co-Op, puzzle-platformer where players can only touch their colour!

name: Chasemaster
description: A perfect blend of adventure, racing, strategy and speed. Chasemaster is all about completing your mission and escaping the city to your agency safely. Make quick decisions, outplay the police and get back safely!

name: New Yankee: Mary's Dark Side
description: The bond between John and Mary is unbreakable. They embark on adventures together, and always support each other. But their lives take an unexpected turn when Mary's memory is lost. Join John in an epic quest to restore Mary's memories now!

name: Hitler Waifu
description: Hitler Waifu is a 3rd person shooter where you play as an anime girl, once on an island, you need to collect things from various places and not die from evil soldiers.

name: Shield King
description: Fight off hordes of enemies, slay bosses, dash through enemies and push them off the buildings In this shield themed roguelite.

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Aquariums DLC
description: Upgrade your fishing game with the latest addon - Aquariums DLC. Add up to 7 large fish tanks to showcase your catches in the new Trophy Room. Choose the water type, interior design, name your tank, and show off your personalized aquarium to friends and family.

name: Notes of my silence
description: Plunge into the silence with Stephan, young musician that lost his hearing and, at the same time, the meaning of life.

name: 5 Minute Climb
description: 5 minutes to jump to the top. Fall and it's back to the start.

name: Magocracy: Experimentation
description: A flying third person shooter with the ability to edit the unit and shot attributes and calculate the resulting power level in game.

name: Crystal Tales Tactics: Echoes of the Libertas War
description: Inspired by Fire Emblem and Final Fantasy Tactics but with NO GENDER RELATIONSHIP RULES, Save the world from an evil emperor Using the power of six elements while Dating whoever you want.

name: Nobody's Home
description: Catch Huntermann, World's Best Detective, in the Shortest Graphic Adventure Game Ever!

name: Lux Ski Jump
description: Ski jumping arcade game with hill creator, online multiplayer, flight style editor, advanced physics and many more.

name: Verne: The Shape of Fantasy
description: Verne: The Shape of Fantasy is a pixel art narrative experience based on the life and works of Jules Verne, which merges exploration, puzzles and interactive dialogues with the imagery of one of the most famous science fiction and adventure writers.

name: Tsukame, Jinsei no Migiuchi! GoGo Zenkaiten Arashi wo Yobu! Honoo no Pachinkas Road
description:
The main character, Gintarou, is a salaryman working at a cell phones sale company. Ever since his senior taught him how to play Pachinko, he's been going to the Pachinko parlor to play. One day, he sees a customer who seems to have lost at Pachinko.

“ Uwaaaaaaaaaaaan—!!! Uwaaaaaaaaa—!!!”

The man's roar echoed sadly. I felt as if there were a melody... like a flower yearning for the spring breeze. People passing through simply laughed at the man and took pictures, eventually an employee came from inside the store and taps the man on the shoulder, signalling him to leave. It's surely an unacceptable reality for that man... I can understand how he feels. Because I, too, am a man on the loser's path. That man's present will become my future.

That is how the protagonist is living, before he meets “Reiyo Yuria” at the Pachinko parlor, changing his life completely...

name: Peas! Animated Sudoku
description: In PEAS! Animated Sudoku, dive into a logic challenge where you fill in the rows and columns with adorable animated peas, each with their own distinct emotion and behavior.

name: Ocarina of Time: Chaos Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: VPet-Simulator
description: VPet is a desktop pet software that supports various interactive. it is open source, free and support Steam workshops.

name: Petit Game Collection Vol.1
description: A spin-off minigame collection of "Needy Streamer Overload". Meet your internet angel in this retro-style game world! In Volume 1, we are featuring 3 mini-games that receive inspiration from good old retro bishōjo games! A retro-style visual novel where you get to experience a rare date scene that can't be seen in the main game. Take Ame to a nice place and give her the time of her life!

name: Solve et Coagula
description: Solve et Coagula is a limit-removing replacement for Doom Episode 2: The Shores of Hell created by Nicolas Monti that was a runner-up for the 2023 Cacowards.

name: Sonic Advance 2 SP
description:
Sonic Advance 2 SP is a ROM hack geared at improving some of the less-loved aspects of Sonic Advance 2. Changes included: Adjusted enemy placements to prevent many ‘cheap shots’, such as item boxes bouncing you into enemies. Many bottomless pit areas were replaced with new routes or made harder to fall into at a moment’s notice. More plentiful Special Ring placement, allowing a more freeform approach to entering Special Stages, and Special Stage entry requirement reduced to 5 SP Rings.

Advance 2 is still a challenging game! Bosses haven’t been touched, and in the later half of the game you should expect plenty of enemies and the return of the dreaded bottomless pits. The hack attempts to balance things in a fair way but also rewards memorisation for repeat play and speedrunning - without as harsh a penalty for not doing so.

name: SpeluNikki
description: A Yume Nikki roguelike platformer fangame, inspired by Spelunky.

name: Crusader
description: Crusader is a 10 map singleplayer levelset for DOOM2 using OTEX and DSDHACKED, featuring a new arsenal of weapons and some new enemies. The recommended port for Crusader is DSDA-Doom - many features will not function without a port that supports DSDHACKED.

name: Light Arrow is Missing
description: Light Arrow is Missing (LAIM) are puzzle hacks where the Light Arrow has been hidden some where in the game and cryptic clues have been left behind that lead to it's location.

name: Kaizo Mario Galaxy: Rebalanced
description: Kaizo Mario Galaxy: Rebalanced is a big update for Kaizo Mario Galaxy (2018), rebalancing the difficulty curve and adding new boss battles.

name: Candle Fire Run!
description:
Candle Fire Run! is an exciting arcade game where players take on the role of a candle and embark on an exciting adventure, trying not to burn out and reach the finish line.

Your goal is to complete a series of levels while collecting power-ups to increase your size and extend your burning time.

name: Isekai: Slow Life
description:
What the-? Been transported to isekai and turned into an adorable walking mushroom?!

In this wonderful new world, you will begin by managing and developing a small town while meeting and engaging with various types of beautiful and bizarre characters. Discover unknown lands with them as you wander at your leisure and enjoy the quiet life.

name: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour China
description: Tea ceremonies, ancient temples and red dragons! Put your puzzles together and embark on a colourful and unforgettable journey through the multifaceted China.

name: LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog: Speed Sphere Challenge
description: Power through obstacles, bounce off walls, defeat Dr. Eggman and save the animals in trouble. Gotta go faster!

name: The Last Windmill
description: Embark on an epic journey in The Last Windmill an action-adventure game where you defend the last standing windmill against relentless hordes of monsters. Engage in intense battles, face increasingly challenging waves of enemies. Become the hero that saves humanity in this thrilling fight.

name: Animal Shelter: Vet Clinic
description: Expand your pet care experience and become a true hero for your furry friends in Vet Clinic DLC by opening your own animal veterinary clinic! 🥼

name: Lunar maiden, River-side Angel, and the Godlike Moment
description: "I make you real." Only he knows me. The identity of the young man who thought so was a serial killer. An 18+ novel game for maidens where a woman obtains divinity along with her ruin.

name: The Night Shift
description: Trapped in a department store during a storm, survive with only a flashlight while completing tasks and evading a malevolent presence that only moves when you're not looking. Uncover secrets and face evolving horrors in this immersive first-person horror game.

name: Paper Mario TTYD64
description: TTYD64 is a PM64 romhack that adds TTYD's gameplay into the original Paper Mario plus all new items, badges, and recipes from that game, and a lot of new areas to explore plus other additions.

name: Touhou Juuouen: Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost.
description: Touhou Juuouen: Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost is the 19th official installment of the Touhou Project. It was announced by ZUN on April 18, 2023 (JST).

name: Forbidden Dojo
description: Embark on an erotic journey where the line between fantasy and reality is blurred. In this sensual visual novel, you are caught between two beautiful and deadly warriors, each with their own unique allure. With each choice you make, the story will unfold, revealing a tale of passion and intrigue.

name: UsoNatsu: The Summer Romance Bloomed From a Lie
description: This is a story about finding love to overwrite the feelings for the one they held dearest. A girls love visual novel about summer, love and adolescence.

name: Block Puzzle
description: An addictive Block Puzzle game, become a block puzzle master.

name: Gloria in Somnium
description: It's time to wake up...

name: Ghost Hunter
description:
Glenda loves ghosts but no one believes in them except her! Using her trusty shovel and lantern, dig up graves and search for new ghost friends. But be careful -- some graves are cursed!

This game was made for A GAME BY ITS COVER 2023.
The game was based on art created by Gabby DaRienzo.

name: Kaiwa 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Dream "ID" Journey
description: Dream "ID" Journey is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame.

name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Game Boy Adventure
description: This is a homebrew port of Bill & Ter's Excellent Game Boy Adventure for the Commodore 64, complete with modern improvements.

name: Plants vs. Zombies Reseeded
description: Plants vs. Zombies Reseeded is a full game pvz mod, built off my old mod titled PvZ rebalanced, featuring reworked adventure levels, new mini-games, new puzzles, new survivals, and every plant being reworked, along with a lot of zombie reworks! There are also 5 difficulty modes, including some challenge modes, like respeeded mode!

name: 1x1
description: 1x1 is an MBF21 (-complevel 21) community project hosted in my discord server. The concept is simple: the maps only use 1 texture and 1 flat, with the exception of a single switch texture and F_SKY (which was only allowed to be used if the texture was transferred to it!). The wad features 24 mbf21-compatible maps (01-21, 31-33) made by various authors, with difficulty ranging from around early Sunlust difficulty to absolutely batshit crazy, though difficulty settings are implemented. Maps are ordered very roughly by difficulty. Pistol starts are intended but not required.

name: Project Americas
description: Project Americas is a game that shows life in a criminal area as it is. You play as an ordinary fighter who has grand ambitions and strives for more. Make your way to the top of the criminal world, make your orders, create your gang, and keep the whole city at bay.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 7 & 8
description: Start final battle in an old city, Chapter 7 & 8 included.

name: Tow Truck Driver Simulator 2023
description: Become the hero of the city's roads, rescue stranded vehicles, and prove yourself as the best tow truck driver in town!

name: Bellboy Boris
description: Bellboy Boris is a 2D platformer where you have to collect luggages and delivery them to specific and randomly defined rooms as fast as you can.

name: Self-Portrait
description: Self-Portrait is a short exploration game on a island filled with chickens in a dream. Enjoy observing the growth of chickens through four seasons, dancing chickens, and others in the coop.

name: Shooter
description: Shoot, dodge, and jump your way through adversaries in this action packed adventure!

name: Mario's Point and Click 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Touhou Houtenkyou: Treasure Castle Labyrinth
description:
A glittering galaxy awaits inside! If you want treasure, get ready to dig! A retro-colorful dark-pop exploration STG fantasy!

Touhou Houtenkyou ~ Treasure Castle Labyrinth is a fan-made Touhou Project game made using the Touhou Danmakufu ph3sx shooting game engine.

Treasure Castle Labyrinth was first conceptualized as a hypothetical Touhou fangame by Iroboshi of iroirodou around the release of Undefined Fantastic Object, and was later made into a music album in 2014 with the help of Pesot.jp/. Development of the Treasure Castle Labyrinth game began in 2018, spearheaded by DOGSDAY. In 2020, the members of both iroirodou and DOGSDAY came together and established a common circle dedicated to the game's development: UWASA Enterprise.

name: Coldsteel Adventure 7
description:
Get ready to become the strongest fighter in the Sonic Fighting Academy in 64 BITS!
Coldsteel The Hedgeheg's 7th outing on the N64 is edgier than ever). Can you beat Trent Razner's ultimate challenge?

name: Fashion Princess: Super Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Perfect Dark PC Port
description: An unofficial port of the N64 game Perfect Dark to PC using a decompilation of that game.

name: Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Floor is Wet
description: Extremely short horror game where you are a worker of the very popular cleaning company, were sent to clean a place where some kind of incident happend. Just do your job and don't worry! Nobody will try to kill you.

name: Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets - Prologue
description: In this prologue you will step into the shoes of little Eddie, a 12 year old boy who goes to the amusement park with his parents until what would be a fun day out turns into a nightmare. Experience the terrifying atmosphere of what awaits you in Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets!

name: Animal Farm Parking: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 2
description: A steamy Visual Novel, set in beautiful decor. The first cuckold experience was a total blast, so Nikki takes the initiative and surprises her loving husband with another wild night - this time, by accepting a cocky bartender’s invitation to his place. Will Adam be excited by her plan?

name: SawCon 64
description: Bowser's stole some power stars and dropped saws everywhere! Get the stars back to save Mushroom Kingdom.

name: Eroblast: Spicy Edition
description:
In this bundle you get content from the base game and Spicy Pack which includes:
- 21 romanceable women to meet
- 120+ hot pics to unlock
- over 30 routes to go with each waifu, with between 5.000 to 10.000 words each
- 280 levels to beat
- 25+ hours of gameplay so get ready for flirting and pics!

name: Luck Breaker
description: In Luck Breaker, your task is to determine the number of dice to remove using the dice.

name: Hentai Stars
description: Dive into the world of hentai stars and meet lovely girls.

name: Wizards Legacy: Nightmare Park Manager Simulator
description: Welcome to Wizards Legacy: Nightmare Park Manager Simulator, a thrilling simulation game that puts you in the shoes of a talented little wizard tasked with building and managing the scariest amusement park imaginable.

name: Wroom Wroom Puzzles
description: Happiness in Every Piece: Wroom Wroom Puzzles - Where Little Minds Thrive!

name: Weedcraft Inc & Moonshine Inc: Risky Business Bundle
description: Start an illegal business and create an empire! Weed or moonshine - your choice!

name: Haunted Hotel XVI: Beyond the Page - Collector's Edition
description: Travel to spooky hotel to track down a horror writer whose inventions might just be leaping off the page!

name: Prison Life Simulator Jail: Gangster Escape Games Scary Architect Battle
description: Outwit, Outplay, Outlast: The Ultimate Prison Life Simulator!

name: Little Doll Queen
description: Gensokyo suddenly plunged into a huge miasma of toxic fog, and the lands are now gloomy and lifeless. The source of these strange phenomena is the Nameless Hill, a forgotten land of sin. It's a danmaku experience full of poisons and suffocation. That means, this is a shooting game.

name: Yearning
description: “Yearning” is a visual novel type of game, telling the story of the protagonist Tan Kai’s ordinary and extraordinary life in the modern Chinese university campus.

name: Truth of Beauty Witch: Marine's Treasure Ship
description: A miraculous collaboration between Houshou Marine and "Tsugunohi" has come to fruition! When the main character becomes a crew member of a pirate ship led by Houshou Marine and realizes a certain fact, you are struck by a series of horrors. Can you unravel the secret behind Houshou Marine's beauty?

name: Out of Hand
description: Shoot, explode, push or slash your friends in this out of hand game. Join 2-8 players who've all lost their arms in a tragic accident to be the last one standing. Now it's up to you to use your makeshift mechanical arm and the items at hand to eliminate your former friends.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Couch Co-op Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and Multiplayer Mode with:

• 45 new levels to explore
• 8 new Achievements to complete
• local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Coloring Pixels: Magic Pack
description: This Magic-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Spells, tricks and wonders of the imagination! Grab your wand and cape and get ready to perform spectacles out of this world!

name: Chaotic Pursuit
description: Chaotic Pursuit is a hardcore Top-Down Shooter with cute graphics. You miss a shot and you're out!

name: Hentai Abigail
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: There Are Dinosaurs
description: In There Are Dinosaurs, you'll face the formidable challenges of resource management and dinosaur encounters. Construct and expand your underground refuge, strategically allocating rooms to meet the essential needs of your community, including food, water, power, and entertainment.

name: Moto Rush GT: Gold Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack and Grip Collection #1 with:
-4 new motorbikes (each with special colors)
-New colors for the rest of motorbikes
-New colors for gloves
-Special, Golden colors for motorbikes
-four pairs of brand-new, high-quality racing gloves. Each pair is designed not only to upgrade your control, but also to boost your rider's aesthetics. Feel the real rush!

name: Way of the Hunter: Tikamoon Plains
description: Venture out into this exotic new hunting ground in the heart if Africa. Enjoy a new hunting adventure, using a broad range of equipment, now also including Bows, and meet wild animals like Buffalo, Hyena, Wildebeest, Honeybadger and Gemsbok.

name: Liberty Belle
description: In this bite-sized 3D Platformer adventure, a villain has unleashed havoc across the United States! It's up to the heroic LIBERTY BELLE to put a stop to his plans!

name: Firefighter Simulator 911: Car Fire Truck Driver
description:
Strap on your helmet and duty belt, and get ready for the mission! Explore over 30 areas inspired by real locations across the United States!
In the game Firefighter: Firefighter Simulator 911 : Car Fire Truck Driver, you'll step into the shoes of a real fire brigade worker in a large American city. Experience thrilling tasks in more than 30 different locations, all inspired by the scenic landscapes of the US West Coast. Drive carefully recreated Rosenbauer America vehicles, extinguish fires using heavy firefighter equipment and tools!
You'll have access to authentic firefighting equipment, including helmets, safety shoes, firefighter axes, crowbars, water guns, and breathing apparatus from renowned American manufacturers.
Fire alarm! Time is of the essence! Put on your shoes, zip up your firefighter uniform, secure your duty belt, don your helmet, start the fire truck, activate special signals and sirens, and take the shortest route to save lives.
Whether it's an industrial area, the suburbs, or the city centre, firefighters are needed everywhere to rescue people! Do you have what it takes to become a highly skilled firefighter? Take on the challenge right now and become the city's number one lifesaver!

name: Nautical Dispute
description: Retro nostalgic big voyage game, dream back to the road of great voyage! Exploration, management, trade, piracy and war are constant topics. With wisdom and luck, gradually build a powerful fleet. Set sail, take the Golden Silk Road again, and reproduce the great voyage!

name: Sydney Hunter Collection
description: The Sydney Hunter Collection brings together four great titles from CollectorVision Games, each originally released for a different classic retro gaming platform. Includes Sydney Hunter and the Shrines of Peril, Sydney Hunter and the Sacred Tribe, Sydney Hunter and the Caverns of Death, and Jester.

name: Piko Interactive Arcade 1
description: Piko Interactive Arcade 1 features 9 unusual, varied and rare arcade games from the mid to late 1990s, including Dragon Master, Master's Fury, Fancy World: Earth of Crisis, Magic Purple, The Legend of Silkroad and Burglar X from Korean developer Unico, plus Art & Magic's visually impressive sports title Ultimate Tennis, and Steel Force and Diver Boy from Electronic Devices Italy

name: Dangeresque: The Roomisode Triungulate
description: Join Dangeresque, the world's greatest private eye/crooked cop, as he puzzles his way through 3 bite-sized roomisodes in this classic-style point n' click adventure.

name: Garten of Banban 4
description: Explore the abandoned levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the residents of the establishment that was left suspiciously empty. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Bone N Soul
description: Bone N Soul is a two player metroidvania. Cast spells and bombard your enemies in ranged combat or become more personal and possess your enemies to advance through a place where desire reigns.

name: Last-Hit Defense
description: Defense game in which you build towers to block enemies from approaching.Action game in which you control a hero to eliminate monsters.An innovative 'Action-Defense' game created by merging two game genres !

name: Fruit Adventure
description: Help Super Strawberry become the bravest Fruit in the Healthy Forest!

name: My Furry Protogen: 18+ Adult Only Patch
description: New additional scenes as a part of the culmination of romanceable character storylines.

name: Acceptance
description: A story-driven psychological thriller about the horrific consequences of a loved one's suicide.

name: My Furry Protogen
description: When your fate is determined by the universe itself, you don't have much options. You either oppose it until the very end, or accept it for the rest of your life, but neither of options can change it.

name: Turbo Overkill
description: Johnny Turbo needs to clean up Paradise, a cyber city overrun by augmented minions under the cult control of the world's most advanced AI, Syn, who's looking to expand to world domination if not stopped here and now. Wall-running, Hero-Time, chain saw leg augments, flying cars and lots of booms. Fight to purge Syn with five new augments, dual chainsaw arms and a second chainsaw leg in the final episode, part 1.

name: Space Mechanic Simulator
description: Become a Space Mechanic! Get your hands dirty, explore the depths of space and repair broken machinery. Diagnose problems using diagrams and tools, perform repairs, manage your resources and watch the simulated machinery come alive. Or just gaze upon the beauty of the Solar System.

name: Quake II
description: Sin descripción

name: World War Z: Victory Lap Weapons Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción
